As expected, the scones were nice and warm, but I honestly prefer mine on the more buttery and crumbly side. The squid ink brioche with smoked salmon and herb mousse was another

title: Worst stay I have ever experienced!
desc: We had booked a Club Deluxe Kallang Room with The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore from 25 – 26 June 2022, and it was a major disappointment. This disappointment started the moment we were doing our check-in: 1) When we did our check-in at Level 3, our reservation details were not captured accurately in the system. The front desk associate informed us that our reservation was Grand Kallang Room, but the reservation which we paid for was for Club Deluxe Kallang Room. At the same time, the front desk associate checked if we would like a smoking room or non-smoking room, and we requested for a non-smoking room. After that, we were being ushered to the club lounge to complete our check-in. 2) At the club lounge, the staff presented to us our confirmation details, and we noted

title: Highly Recommend
desc: This is hotel is in a really great location and the rooms are large, super clean, and very comfortable. The breakfast buffet has a huge selection although the layout is a bit confusing. The hotel itself is a beautiful space and the complimentary spa for hotel guest is amazing. The room service was amazing too!

title: Five stars lobby, two stars room experience
desc: Have been a regular at the Ritz whenever visiting Singapore. Revisited the place after two years and was overall disappointed with the experience. The room was outdated, and so was the infrastructure in the room. Coffee machine was broken. Baby cot wasn’t set up despite informing the hotel pre-arrival. Had to call three to four times before it was finally delivered, near mid-night on a Saturday night. No turndown service. Last but not least, room was noisy as you can hear all the footsteps passing by. On the plus side, location/view is a strong point. Lobby has been freshly renovated despite the outdated guest rooms. Breakfast is solid with a good spreads of choices. Ground staff was very attentive but not the room service staffs Net-net, disappointed with the experience.

title: Impeccable
desc: The room was very nice, the view amazing. The staff was impeccable, great customer service. Food was excellent. I will stay here again the experience was great. The hotel was within walking distance to attractions.

title: One of the best hotels I've stayed in! Amazing staff. Great location.
desc: The room was so spacious and very homey. Our vacation was a bit long and if it wasn't for the coziness and roominess of the room then we probably wouldn't have survived....hahaha. Big windows give you big views of either Kallang or Marina Bay. Pool was refreshing especially in SG's hot and humid weather. Location was superb. Malls surround you. Marina Square, Millenia Walk, Suntec, Marina Bay - all walking distance. Staff was all very friendly and always willing to serve. Special shout out to Prakesh from concierge who always approaches us and asks us how we are, where we were going and how our day was. He was always ready to offer his service. Thanks much to Murphy Loh for accommodating our requests. Will definitely come back!

title: Disappointing stay at Ritz Carlton
desc: My family has stayed at the Ritz Carlton several times and it has been our destination of choice for staycations in town. But that may no longer be the case going forward. The service levels that we experienced during our recent stay were really poor. First, the check in time was supposed to be 3pm. Yet when we tried to check in at 315pm we were told that the room was not ready and had to wait until 4pm before we were allowed into the room. During check in we were told by the reception staff that the room came with complimentary breakfast. Yet when we went for breakfast the next day we were told by the colony staff that breakfast will be charged. When we checked back with the reception staff we were told that we would get a reduced rate of $25 net per pax due to the confusion.

title: Standard of service can be better
desc: Ritz Carlton, Millenia Singapore has pride itself as a 5 star hotel. It was but not now. The standard of service has deteriorated on almost every conceivable front. Let's start with the email communication before the check in date, which was attended to by several staff and some with quite unbearable command of English. For instance, "I am pleased to extend a compliment­ary 100g chef’s choi­ce cake in lieu of this special occasion". It took me a while to understand what Ritz Carlton was trying to convey. I have also written in to request for an early check in at 12pm. The reply from Ritz Carlton reservation team was "As our standard chec­k-in time is at 3pm, I am pleased to sha­re that you can check in from 4pm onward­s!". I nearly fell off my chair while reading the reply. I

title: *Amazing Stay!*
desc: We stayed 4 nights & from the moment we got down from the car until the day we left, service was absolutely amazing. The staff were attentive & extending their help one way or another. It was my birthday when we checked in & Melissa at the front desk noticed & promptly wished me. In the evening when we were back to the room, there was a hand written note from her, a little cake & chocolates waiting for me. Sweet! Not only that, 2 days later, she also sent similar note & chocolates to my son for his birthday even though he only made the reservation for me & not stayed there. Thank you, Melissa for your thoughtful gesture! The fantastic room was on the upper floors with a nice view. We loved the space, the sofa, the walk in closet & the huge bathroom! My only gripe for

title: Still one of the best in Singapore
desc: We were here for nights stay. We booked total of 3 rooms and 1 suite. This was our first visit to this property in 11 years. So we were wondering if this hotel still good. 1. Location: perfect 2. Staff: always good and caring 3. Rooms: very good. But I have allergies towards dust, and I was sneezing the whole stay. Perhaps the rooms have not been used since covid. 4. Sleep quality: good it could have been perfect without the dust 5. Food: excellent 6. Pricing: quite reasonable Conclusion: this property is still one of the best in Singapore. We will be back for sure.

title: 5 star hotel with 1st Class Club Lounge
desc: Went to Ritz Cartlon Hotel ， the five star hotel with 1st class club lounge.. At 2.20 pm ， reach lobby and wait for my turn.. I was attended by staff who was manager here, who informed that room was in cleaning process. He instructed his junior staff to take me to 32 flr to have afternoon tea I was given a glass of champagne and a cup of coffee Club host show me around and i help myself to buffet. As i having my cake , and pastry ,the host come to my table presenting me room card I then went to room at 29 flr.. Room was great with nice view of Kallang. River. King bed facing window , and worktable- seat arrangement is fantastic Thirty mins later, went for short swim ,then have glass of cocktail till 5.30pm Later went for gym for brief workout till 6pm At 6.40pm , went for

title: Good Stay, but lots of hiccups
desc: Encountered a lot of minor problems during the stay. The Family enjoyed, and the property still felt like home. Service itself was lacking. Buffet Breakfast forgot orders, and closed early (items were not refilled at 10am, and stations seemed waiting for 10.30 so they could pack up) The hallway was noisy, worse, our room door was across the service area, so could hear the banging of the metal doors, even early in the morning at 4am. The soundproofing of the main door was not good at all. Large gaps around the door. There was no mobile checkin or mobile keys. So it wasnt contactless. It was very hard to call the front desk, we needed to wait around 10 mins, just to speak with someone to ask for extra towels. The Bonvoy app allowed request, but on the first day we were there,

title: Staycation using my Marriott Vacation Club points
desc: Last Feb we staycation in this hotel whilst social distancing was still enforced. The hotel occupancy was very Low so as Marriott platinum elite member, we were acknowledged and treated fairly although the property does not participate in the Marriott programme. This time round, occupancy rate was much higher as tourists are welcome again. The treatment we received as Marriott platinum elite was disgraceful. I felt insulted. The fatso next to me received a much warmer reception using his Amex voucher for a complimentary stay. We were coldly treated and as a afterthought was presented later in the day with a small pathetic jar of 5 cookies!how insulting! FYI my club points are expensive and I paid $3700 for 6000 points annually. So my stay is market rate! As Marriott elite

title: Good staycation but some improvements required
desc: We booked a Club Deluxe Room for a surprise staycation at Ritz Carlton to celebrate my dad’s bday and Fathers Day. The pros: 1. The view was gorgeous! 2. Our Club Deluxe room was well kept and clean and the bathroom is awesome 3. Service at the lounge was generally good, and we would like to specially commend Sam Wong at the club lounge for his attentiveness to my Mom and Dad and my 2 nieces! He even went the extra mile to bring them some ice cream and the kids activity pack! The kids loved him and he really made their day!! He was one of the reasons our stay was memorable!! - the hotel prepared a small bday cake and fruits for my dad However, we also had some disappointing encounters: 1. We upgraded our room to let my Dad enjoy the club lounge. He was looking forward to

title: High Tea at the Ritz in Singapore
desc: Bring a big hunger. The experience launches with a glass of champagne (private label for the Ritz from the Barons de Rothschild) and five savory appetizers - our favorite was the dragon's beard (you'll understand when you see it) stuffed crustacean. Then Hans, the crepe chef, prepares fresh crepes, plus there are on offer a large number (10?) of delicious small sweet bites which you get to eat as many as you wish. Our favorite was the mango pudding. The tiramisu was to die for - almost the best we ever had (but it's hard to beat the northern Italian competitor.) Lots of little chocolates of different flavors and compositions. Great service - they make you feel welcome, bring fresh plates, replenish the tea. Be sure and greet Emily, one of the hostesses.

title: Mixed feelings
desc: Stayed 2 nights at this hotel. Quality level of hotel is good but a bit old school decor. Location is decent but Fullerton is much better located. What bothers me about this property are the very long waiting lines (upon check out, breakfast,…). Also surprising that I booked this hotel via the Bonvoye app but that the hotel is not part of Bonvoye. This creates misunderstandings and frustrations that could have been avoided

title: Lavish Hotel with Great Service
desc: We stayed for my birthday week in July 2022. We had two suites on the Cub level and stayed with our kids. Service was brilliant. They have a few lovely restaurants downstairs. The club has a more quieter food and seating lounge area but the choices are restricted. Indoor pool was amazing. Liverpool football stayed there during our stay and we got to see the whole team. The views are spectacular. Would definitely go back, perhaps for the F1 as you can watch it from the hotel.

title: RITZ CARLTON MILLENIA EXPERIENCE
desc: The hotel live up to its name as one of the best hotel in Singapore. Location-wise: 🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡 View from the room : 🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡 Service : 🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡 Facilities: 🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡 Food : 🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡 The only 👎for me is the condition of the hotel carpets. Really needs refurbishing esp. the elevators. Next is the wooden floors, so noisy due to their creaking sounds. But these dampers will surely be covered by the so so so superb view that the marina Bay windows can offer. All thumbs up 👍👍 for this. OVERALL EXPERIENCE 👍👍

title: Holiday
desc: Superb hospitality!!! Just arrived SG and everything is just as i imagined! exceptional service from the heart, stunning suites, incredible food and drinks, super friendly staff and management, beautiful outdoor swimming pool, and gym facilities. One of my favourite hotels in the world, I would not stay anywhere else in SG. Highly recommended 🤩

title: Truly the epitome of class and luxury
desc: This would have to be the best hotel brand. From the moment I entered this hotel, I could feel the glamour and class that I would associate with luxury. I could experience the consistency of the their impeccable service from the main door to the front desk to the front of the Colony restaurant and in the wait staff. The quality and attention to detail are truly evident.

title: Best hotel experience!
desc: Having my proposal held in Ritz Carlton Millenia was truly the most memorable experience i ever had! Everything was so perfect, from the best views to the best service! Mr Dickson Soon’s friendly and enthusiastic service was truly commendable and had elevated our whole experience there! We wish to thank Ritz Carlton and Mr Dickson and we look forward to our next visit there!

title: Fantastic views from marina facing rooms
desc: Booked a stay to watch the parade rehearsal and fireworks - grand marina room had a superb view in air-conditioned comfort. dickson was very helpful with questions before the stay and corine was very sweet to offer my child some snacks.

title: our stay in Ritz Singapore
desc: We stayed in this hotel for 6 nights from 24 July to 30 July. We had a fantastic stay in a Club room for the six nights. The staff at the entrance were very polite and helpful and took us straight to the Club lounge for checking in. All the club lounge staff have excellent manners and they were very helpful and were ready to look after us. Our special thanks to Chuckie and Jithra for their service. Some of the names for special mention are Fadullah, Aishya, Sathish, and the rest of the crew (sorry forgot your names) at the club lounge. Our special thanks to Mr Kong and Mr Tang for their pleasant helpful assistance. We were happy to take a photo with Mr Kong. We hope to come back in the future.

title: Great stay for work during birthday
desc: Booked at Ritz Millennia for 5 nights during a work trip. The room was one of the best I’ve stayed. Spacious, modern, two single cosy beds and a great view of the city. Bathroom too was very spacious and specially the bathtub was the best to soak in at the end of a busy day. Few negatives were the sink draining was a bit slow and I wasn’t happy about cleaning on the last 3 nights. Buffet had a wide spread and as a vegetarian I had Plenty of choices. There was an Indian section, salad bar, English breakfast etc. Danish pastries were one of the best i tried. Few vegan options too. However I was quite surprised to note that the buffet menus was pretty much the same throughout my entire week. But no complaints as the food was really good. Staff are very good and helpful. At one

title: Breakfast at Colony
desc: The Colony has a vast breakfast spread. We tried their nasi lemak with otak and sambal which is the best amongst all the options. The teochew noodles made fresh on the spot with springy fish balls and fish cakes has a nice broth and lots of toppings to choose from. There is vegetables dal and chicken curry to go with the dosa, idlyappam and prata. The sausages, grilled tomatoes and crispy hash browns were nice. The omelette station is ok, you could ask for more ingredients in the thick omelette cooked to order. The Japanese section offers soba, smoked salmon and assorted pickles. There is chicken Siew mai, lor Mai Kai and pao. The ice cream station has flavors of chestnut, coconut, strawberry, chocolate and vanilla. The wait for the freshly made waffles and banana pancakes is

title: Terrible Experience from start to finish
desc: There was a soccer team staying at the hotel the same time I was and the entire place felt like it went into lockdown. the staff wouldn't let me in the door to go to my room after 19 hours of travel. I spoke with them through the glass that they wouldnt open, and most waived me off or ignored me entirely - even after I explained to them that I was a guest of the hotel and showed them my key. This property also doesnt subscribe to the Bonvoy Elite program so you get no points for your stay, and no nights for your status. Nothing says this unless you click through different links on the site and read the small print. terrible experience.

title: Perfect hotel with great views!!
desc: Stayed at this hotel for business needs for 5 days. Arrived after a stressful flight but was greeted by the most lovely and welcoming staff who helped me with everything I needed. Hotel was lovely and clean and our use of the meeting room spaces was great for what we needed. Rooms were very spacious with the most amazing views from the bathroom!! Great location on the Marina for a walk in the evening! Would recommend this hotel massively.

title: Singapore's Pioneer Luxury Hotel
desc: Opened for business in the 90s, it was one of the original building/hotels built around the marina, it was and it still is one of the most prestigious hotels in Singapore. Over the years, it was one of the main "GO TO" hotels in SG and it still is, due to the brand recognition. It has one of the the BEST view any hotel dream to have. If u are able to get the bay view, which happens around 50% of the time, u will have a very memorable view. With that said, several key things I would like to point out to travellers who r considering this hotel, which isnt something the hotel can change easily or at all. 1) Location, its not too close to orchard or other "Main" area, but u do have close proximity to the bay if thats what u want. 2) the build is of older design in an older

title: Beautiful hotel, with terrific service; showing its age
desc: Great location, overlooking Marina Bay, providing an iconic view of the city (and of all the rehearsals for the upcoming National Day). It’s a large hotel, so the interior spaces are somewhat sprawling - must be over 100 tables in the restaurant, for example. The spaces are grand in scale and architecture, but the interiors are showing their age somewhat, with dated styles and finishes, and some areas showing significant wear and tear. Think of it as grand, old and familiar - like the home of your wealthy, formidable and stylish grandmother. This theme continued into my corner suite. Fabulous views, dated interiors. And a perplexingly complicated and unintuitive (and hidden!) set of switches to work lights and blinds (a joke among our party after our first night was that it

title: A few comments during our stay
desc: The location of the hotel is perfect especially with a family as it is connected to malls (Marina Square, suntec city...) just by walking and has some nice kids areas to keep them busy. We booked a suite, which had an absolutely amazing view of the marina bay sands hotel and the whole area. And it was in a very clean condition. There were some issues that should be mentioned which I hope the hotel should improve. 1. Concierge never answered any phone calls during our stay. We had to go all the way down stairs and ask. 2. Colony restaurant was great however when i called reception they told me I have to book and that there are no bookings for this whole month! As we were heading out of the hotel we passed by Colony and asked one of the staff if there was a table, and to

title: Thank You for the wonderful stay!
desc: Special thanks to Mr Dickson Soon for going out the way to ensure that our stay is enjoyable!! My partner really enjoyed the stay too and can't wait to stay again!! The suite room is really very big and the view is breathtaking!

title: Still the best Marina view
desc: Stayed again after two-years and still as amazing as my previous stays. Still the best room view of Marina (totally worth to book this room type), even got to watch the NDP fireworks and performances directly room the room window, will visit again for sure.

title: The staff are the true gems of the Ritz!
desc: A belated review but I wanted to pen my thanks to Dickson Soon and his amazing team for a wonderful experience helping me execute a flawless proposal. He went through lots of personalised efforts to make me and my fiancé feel special on the day. The facilities and rooms at the Ritz are second to none, we were fully enveloped in luxury and excellent service each day. Thank you for the lifelong memories and we’ll see you again soon! :)

title: Weird service but good hotel
desc: We had 2 nights here on our way back from Europe to try to help with jet lag. It partially worked. The hotel is right opposite marina Bay sands and next to a bunch of other 5 stars hotels. The rooms are spacious, light and with great views on either side. We had 2 rooms, and I personally wouldn't pay more for the harbour view, I thought the other side was equally interesting. Also I wouldn't pay more for the suite, the base room is actually plenty big. I really liked the room, they are so comfy. And everything felt just right. The beds are very lovely. Service was weirdly too enthusiastic. It felt uncomfortable in certain parts. The cleaner kept following me to aske me if I wanted turn down service. He must have asked over a dozen times, every 10 minutes he'd ask. And

title: One of the most memorable hotel stays!!!
desc: As expected from a Ritz Carlton hotel, our room was beyond luxurious with a totally comfortable bed and an amazingly spacious bathroom with all the fabulous amenities. The rooms are cleaned a few times a day on request and fresh towels kept in the room. The hotel has a fabulous spa, gym, pool and common fasciitis. It’s worth trying all of them for a complete experience. We also enjoyed the 3D art tour but the connection on the phone wasn’t great so it was a tad frustrating. We had a room with executive lounge access which was delightful. The service in the exec lounge was impeccable. They always anticipated our needs without hovering over us. Chuck, Hamza and team were just amazing, they were so friendly and chatty. Always saving our fav table for us. And served us a special

title: The magic of RC
desc: Our stay at the Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore was once again nothing short of perfection. Coming back here again after 8 months and despite the much higher occupancy rate in comparison to my previous visit, the staff truly did not disappoint. The renowned personalised service of the Ritz-Carlton brand echoed through every aspect of our stay. Upon entering the hotel, we were greeted by Mahesh who then immediately ushered us to the Club Lounge at Level 32 for the check-in. Mahesh then handed us over to the very warm and dedicated Club Lounge team of Ladies and Gentlemen under the leadership of Javier. The check-in process was well taken care of by the professionalism of Javier while my mum and I enjoyed the mid-day snack against the magnificent backdrop of the Marina Bay view.

title: Magical Family Trip
desc: I rarely write reviews, but our recent experience at the Ritz in Singapore was absolutely fantastic. Our family of 5 spent just 2 days at the hotel, but in that short period of time the hotel went far out of its way to show us unparalleled hospitality. It's quite remarkable when a hotel far exceeds your already high expectations. Often with hotels in this class, it comes down to the people. In this case, somewhat surprisingly, Lee Lee, the server we met when we first arrived at breakfast stands out as truly exceptional. In addition to being extremely warm and friendly, she quickly became my kids favorite person in a matter of minutes. She surprised us by reaching out housekeeping and arranging for a cool tent bed for my daughter, special treats at night for our kids. The

title: Perfect weekend staycation spot 💖
desc: When we planned this stay, we didn't tell anyone that we were newly weds. But we were treated so well by the staff, it made our experience a truly memorable one 😊 When we arrived at the reception an hour later than check-in, it was clear that the staff were busy and so we were expecting quite a wait. Our room wasn't ready at the moment but our receptionist Cally was quick to respond and that put us at ease at the start of our vacation. She offered us a nice time at the bar while waiting, where the Mr enjoyed a very fragrant pot of Pai Mu Tan Melon Tea (I highly recommend it!) and I had a nice chocolate tart and coffee. To compensate us further for our wait, which was less than an hour, they gave us late check-out, complimentary breakfast on each day of our stay and some

title: Great location
desc: Great location in Singapore. Fantastic Hospitality and professionalism. Recently renovated restaurants. We were welcomed by Lavin, who actually remembered us from our last stay a few years ago. Staff went the extra mile to assist. We received excellent assistance from the staff. Some of the names who I can remember are Kumar, Dexter, Smita, Michelle, Alfian, Lavin, amongst others. Dickson and Dexter actually took time to bid farewell to us and was kind enough to check that we had all our travel documents and baggage. Rooms are spacious, walk-in shower, bath with all amenities. Excellent view. Hotel is linked to the Millenia Walk and within walking distance to the MBS Mall. We will return.

title: Fading star - not luxury, not personalised, not high touch: now just average.
desc: Fading star This used to be the best hotel in Singapore but no more, the attention to detail that the RC is known for and the level of personalised service has gone. Here’s our experience: I booked the RC for my wife;s birthday and NDP in 2021 and it was cancelled with a week to go because the hotel became a SHN hotel, no real apology, no re-booking just cancelled. This left us with no where to go so I hoped for better things and booked 9 months ago for my wife’s birthday and NDP in 2022. I had booked the Club Lounge Suite and asked the Club Lounge if they could have a sign saying Happy Birthday and some decorations to surprise my wife. Previously I had got this for free. They came back with a price list! But it did say that I could personalise the sign. I asked them to.

title: Wonderful staycation at Ritz-Carlton Singapore
desc: Everything about the hotel was perfect - staff service was very personalised at the frontdesk, club, pool etc. It felt like staff went out of their way to help us with every single item. At the Club Lounge, staff was friendly with my child so that made us feel very welcome. At the swimming pool, the staff served us our towels and drinks because it was NDP, and made sure we were not lacking in anything. The room was so comfortable, with a perfect view of the floating platform to watch the entire NDP. The kids friendly night safari tent was perfect too - made my boy sleep in it the entire night by himself. Thank you so much to everyone at the hotel. We are smitten by your service and we will definitely be back.

title: Best staycation - Home away from home!
desc: Ritz will always be my first choice for Staycation! All the staffs (even at the restaurant & bar) are so warm and friendly, no matter when I meet any staff, a warm greeting would be exchanged. I am always pleasantly surprised when I return after shopping nearby, the doorman will always say 'welcome back'. The amount of details that go around these people is really meticulous!

title: My favourite stay in Singapore
desc: Ritz Carlton Millenia is a beautiful hotel with a spectacular Marina Bay view and good restaurants and bars. I always enjoy my stay at Ritz but what attracts me going back is the excellent customer service. And there are a few individuals who I would like to compliment. Dickson, the VIP Service supervisor is very warm, friendly, helpful and efficient. He always tries his best to accommodate his customers’ needs and requests. He always greets me on arrival and treats me with a surprise gift. In my last stay, I asked him where to buy the bean chocolates which my husband fell in love with. I was disappointed that the bean chocolates were not saleable but Dickson managed to get a tiny jar of them for me. Thanks for his assistance which was highly appreciated. Arulganth also

title: Good as always
desc: Like Nothing Changed. Back after a 3 year hiatus and only just checked out but can’t wait to go back again. The club lounge remains worth splurging on however the food selection wasn’t as good as I remembered from our previous visits. Staff were attentive as always and Chuckie and Jithra always seemed to be around to assist with any queries. We had a great time in Republic which is an absolute asset to the hotel. Drinks and bar food were excellent and we saw some familiar faces from years ago which was nice. Martin sure knows how to make an excellent old fashioned! The rooms are showing it’s age. We were in a suite and there’s wear and tear showing. Cleanliness and housekeeping service are of a high standard but a refresh in decor and design is overdue. It wouldn’t stop

title: Family Staycation over National Day Marina Bay View
desc: Memorable stay at Ritz Carlton over the National Day with my family and 4 kids. A big thank you to front desk manager Mr Kanga for attending to our enquiries. He was able to resolve and meet our family needs and we sincerely appreciate his patience in attending to us. During our stay we were boiling water using the flask in our room and the power tripped. We made a call to the concierge for assistance. We are truly impressed that while the hotel had many guest due to National Day the technician arrived within mins and resolved it. Big thank you to front desk Jonathan, Lucille, Yuki and the security staffs for your smiles and assistance during our family stay. The warm service by the different teams within Ritz Carlton made a big difference to our family staycation. We will

title: First class service in a luxury hotel
desc: Was greeted formally at the entrance. Staff were very polite, well dressed and professional in attending our needs throughout the staycations! The bathtub design was absolutely amazing! Certainly a great place for gathering and staycation.

title: Luxury at its peak
desc: It is a beautiful and luxurious hotel with great service and amenities. The pool is marvelous. It is huge and extremely clean and a joy to swim in. We were in the room facing MBS and it is drop dead gorgeous. Worth every penny. The room itself is very spacious in comparison to other similar hotels. The MBS can be viewed not only from the living area but also while relaxing in their bathtub. From our room, we had views of Gardens by the bay, MBS, Merlion

title: Rooms to absolutely avoid
desc: A biz partner and myself stayed in two different rooms. One both facing the marina, so the more premium rooms, one would think. My room was therefore on the side of the elevator ducts. Between the room and the elevators there was a service station, so I was not even directly next to the elevators. I could here the elevators railing up and down as if I were next to a subway. The other room was separated by one room from the elevators, same outcome. Recommendation after a painful stay: INSIST on a room at last 3 rooms off the elevators when booking. You will NOT get a good nights rest. the prices are steep, so getting a room with such noise pollution is unacceptable. Also, this Ritz does not participate in the Marriott program like other hotels of the chain; however they

title: Singapore National Day Celebration - Thank Ritz Carlton Staffs for a great Service to Family!
desc: 1. Singapore is 57years old, after a tough COVID period for 2 years, the best way to celebrate is to book a great hotel in Singapore to celebrate her birthday! This is also the last time NDP celebrate at the float as it will give way for the construction of NS square in the next few years. 2. The service at the Ritz Carlton was exceptional. There was absolutely no issue that was not addressed timely and with satisfactory results. Our family were particularly impressed with how the hotel staff anticipated our needs. Numerous communications to ensure the need and wants of our family are confirmed & delivered. 3. We stayed at the Singapore Ritz Carlton (SRC) for 1 night on 9 Aug 22, and it turn out to be the loveliest place to stay, with clean and comfortable rooms, and

title: Downgraded from King to twin
desc: Arriving at 10:00 PM on an intl’ flight only to get downgraded from a king to a twin due to an overbooking issue on their side. They offered absolutely ZERO when they made the change. Then they capitulated to a free breakfast. I don’t want a free breakfast, I want the room I booked. You have absolutely no recourse when they pull this motel stunt on a late check in. Their total lack of concern on rectifying the situation falls very short of the Ritz. Highly disappointed. Will never stay at this odd ball Ritz that does not follow franchise rules or offer points ever again.

title: Costly and Horrible Experience at Ritz Carlton Millenia
desc: I had on the 29th of Sept checked in into the hotel for one night. They had taken a SGD 950 charge on my card for room charges and deposit. Since I had not utilize anything other then the room charges (my room is a club room and all the club charges are included in the room rate itself). Upon express checkout, I was never sent any bill by the hotel, even by e-mail. I had thought that everything was settled when at around 7pm the same day I had received a SMS notification from my bank stating that I had been charged an extra over SGD 350++ by the hotel on top of the deposit paid earlier. Shocked, I had called up the hotel and I was told that there was charges at the hotel bar called Bar Republic hence the extra charges on my card. I had then asked the hotel front desk for a

title: Best hotel in Singapore by far!!
desc: What’s not to live about the Ritz Carlton Millenia?! It is the PERFECT hotel for any occassion. From arrival to departure from the hotel, you are greeted with a smile, and service is second to none! Then there is the accomodation itself. The newly renovated lobby is in inviting. Republic bar- well, it is easy to understand why it is in the world’s top 100 bars! The rooms are as perfect as they are when Ritz Carlton Millenia first opened ; the views throught the iconic octaganol windows are breath taking. I have been coming for the last 10 years and will continue to do so!! See you soon!!

title: Superb service at the Republic
desc: We had recently an afternoon event at the Republic bar and the service has been fantastic, a huge thanks to Mr. Phil Park and his assistant Mr. Duncab. Impeccable and very guest-oriented waiters always anticipating guests' wishes and particularly polite. We look very much forward to returning whenever back in Singapore! Many thanks indeed.

title: Great hotel - but no real loyalty program
desc: Actually a really excellent hotel, no issues at all. Positives are room size, service at any time of day, accommodation of the pcr tests - even in room for those travelling to countries requiring this. Minor comment is the lack of membership to Marriott Bonvoy rewards. Therefore no real loyalty program.

title: Luxurious Stay
desc: Great Luxury !!! Went on work travel so was there for 2 nights only but worth every minute spent. Awesome food. Great views from all around - rooms, lift lobby etc . in one line its almost the perfect hotel.

title: A fantastic Wedding Staycation
desc: I always choose Ritz Carlton, Millenia as my ideal staycation place. And now to celebrate with my wife after our wedding, it wasn't a hard decision that we decided on it as our Wedding staycation. Otw to the Hotel we weren't expecting much other than a good time to enjoy and relax. However during the check-in the front office lady greeted us as Mr & Mrs which was a surreal feeling!! 😊😊😊 after the seamless check-in. We went up to the room straight away and lo and behold we were surprise at the amenities that was prepared meticulously and waiting for us!! Not long after we had a call from Chef Sundar congratulating us and telling us to enjoy the amenities. On to the next day, we were surprise when the In-room dining called and said that they have prepared something for us

title: Wedding Solemnization Party at Colony
desc: I had a wonderful dining experience at Colony for my ROM dinner party on 26 Sep 2022. Tessa was fulfilled all my needs and she stayed back to ensure everything goes smoothly. She also handed over to one of her colleague, Raj to take care of my dinner before she off duty. Raj is very attentive and all my guests also very happy for the night. Thank you Tessa & Raj

title: Not for milestone events
desc: First, the hot water tap at the basin doesn’t work. It didn’t bother us then till the next day when the cold water tap start leaking and was creating a puddle at the basin. I found out that there was a chip at the corner of the shower stall through the hard way, my toe got cut. It was impossible to bump into that corner due to its awkward angle but small parts of the chipped tiles were scattered over the floor and luckily it wasn’t my kids who got cut. I arranged for some birthday decorations to put up in the room. While arranging the timing with the coordinator, I was informed that all occupants have to vacate the room. I asked if my kids could just stay in a corner and the coordinator repeated twice impatiently that all of occupants have to vacate the room. Ok, I got that

title: Short stay; expected more
desc: This was a quick, 1-night stay, where I landed in SG in the evening and departed first thing in the morning. The property’s main lobby, etc, is mostly what you’d expect from a Ritz Carlton. When checking in during the evening, there’s definitely a loud, lounge-y vibe. My main goal was to get into the room, take a bath, and crash. Unfortunately, 1) no bath salts were in the room - it took two calls and about 45-minutes to get them, vital time when you just want to crash. Ended up foregoing the bath in the end. And 2) just as I was about to finally crawl into bed, half the room’s power went out. Yep, half of all lights, outlets, etc, just went dead. So, that resulted in another 45-minutes, luggage shuffling, and 2 unexpected visitors. While I’m grateful the electrical

title: Just when I thought it couldn’t get better…
desc: Just when I thought it couldn’t get better… Beyond being engulfed in complete luxury with all the usual amenities of a six-star hotel, the service quality was absolutely over the top! The General Manager, Peter Mainguy arranged for me to have my favorite Marina Bay room with gorgeous views of the harbor. A big thanks for accommodating my special request. However, even more impressive was the service quality from the staff. Noticing that I was using a pillow support for my neck, the thoughtful evening Butler had arranged for me to have a complimentary neck support memory foam pillow without my even asking. This amazing attention to detail and the customers individual personal needs is really what sets the Ritz Carlton apart from other leading hotels. Another key

title: First time in Singapore
desc: We love the brand and this hotel was lovely. The style of the Hotel was not as beautiful as others we have stayed at but it was still very nice. There was some construction going on at the Hotel which was annoying but not too bad. We would stay here again as the staff and food were incredible.

title: We will keep coming back every time we visit Singapore!
desc: There is always a danger that a past experience that was exceptional in every way can be marred when revisited. You know the feeling when you walk into a hotel lobby and see things differently from the first time as it is not a new experience anymore? The eye is a little more critical, expectations have been built on from years of no travel and memories are embellished possibly enhancing what may not have been there before. Maybe it is the tired looking treatments that you don’t remember seeing before or the team that welcome you have lost their genuine enthusiasm, responses are duller. Was the attention to detail and the preemptive response from everyone at the property generously imagined from the past visit? I have experienced that feeling before and that is why my

title: Its a new magic every time..
desc: Imagine this. You arrive Singapore at 6 in the morning after a 5 hour flight. You take a local taxi from the airport to your hotel hoping that you get the room earlier than the standard Check In time. Magic happens the moment you arrive the hotel. You are greeted by a gentleman who already knows you, by name and knows that you have travelled on a night flight. Another gentleman come to escort you inside the hotel but instead of taking you to the reception, he takes you straight to your room. Check in formalities are done in the room while your bags follow. I am in my rooms in less than 5 mins of arriving at the hotel. I wonder which other 600+ room city hotel in the world can do this. Needless to say, rooms was allocated as per my preference since I have stayed at Ritz

title: Amazing hotel
desc: I couldn’t fault the hotel at all. It was spotlessly clean and the breakfasts were great with lots of options on offer and delicious. The staff were super friendly, especially Adam at the concierge desk, Kong, one of the door security guys and the Filipino maid who had just arrived in Singapore and serviced room 703. I didn’t use the spa or gym but both looked amazing. The pool opens at 7 am until 9 pm. It’s very attractive and it was lovely swimming at night in a temperature of 29°C with no worries about getting burnt! The hotel is well positioned within walking distance of Raffles and the iconic Marina Bay hotel. I want to go back asap!

title: Great service at Republic
desc: We really enjoyed our family lunch at the Republic bar. Superb service provided by Phil and Lizy. Would love to visit here again - thanks for the team! The food was great too as well as friendly service.

title: Used to be my favorite hotel in Singapore
desc: This hotel used to be my #1 hotel I stayed in Singapore, but it seems they are understaffed and lack of training… issues like not being able to meet the 3pm check in, not being able to offer the room booked (requested king bed but ended up with twin bed), not making up room even when you requested it in the morning and till late in the evening when you came back it was still not done, not available / not picking up at various service lines (front desk, in room dining, concierge, etc) are quite commonly experienced in this hotel recently… And a great disappointment that this hotel is in the Marriott Bonvoy system but not really as points cannot be credited for staying in the hotel… One good thing that our toddler (under 2) enjoyed was the free ice-cream and free meals at Colony

title: 2N at Kallang Room
desc: We stayed at Ritz Carlton for 2 nights. I have dined a few times here but first time staying. I have made a couple of changes to my booking and the staff were very accommodating to my requests. I arrived around 2.30pm on check in day. There were a few people ahead of me but the wait was short (maybe about 10min). Front desk were professional and efficient in their check in. The Deluxe Kallang Room i got was basic and came at a lower level (11). It was very spacious. I had a child and they added a bed without even me requesting. The concierge briefed me on the buttons in the room. This is something essential now given that they have hotels do not provide hotel directory now. The buttons for the curtains in the bedroom and bathroom were in good working condition. Beds were firm

title: Impeccable Service at Club Lounge and Thank you, Mr Archie!
desc: Stayed for 2 nights here at The Ritz Carlton for a company event held at level 1, Grandball room. The service is nothing but amazing. Especially the Club lounge staff, Asst Manager -Jit, Sathish, Dhian, Aisha, Hamzah, the chefs, and stewarding uncle all have been truly amazing! So friendly and I would like to also thank your hotel manager, Mr. Archie, too!

title: Really good. Some small aspects to improve though
desc: Stayed 5 nights at the Ritz in Singapore around one week ago, and overall the experience was great. Very nice and spacious room, spotless clean, well equipped, nice beds allowing to a great sleep, good sofa to sit and relax, very stable wifi signal, so all what a hotel at this level needs to provide, was provided and at an excellent level. Now I think that there were small details which prevent me to give me the hotel an excellent rate. Please note that via checking my profile, is quite clear that I stay regularly in lots of high-end 5* hotels so most of the comments are also in the context of what other hotels provide. MiniBar - there is an empty minibar in the room. If you want something to drink you need to check the menu scanning a QR code. Then place an order, wait around

title: WORST HOTEL IN SINGAPORE
desc: Worst experience today in Ritz Carlton! The hotel overbooked! What kind of booking service do you have! They will force you to wait for 3hrs just to get a room that id lower than what you paid for! ROBBERS! Very insensitive for business travelers! Never again!

title: Staycation nightmare and never to return again
desc: I brought my family of 5 for a short 3D2N Staycation in Oct 2022 before our year end trip to Bali, Chiang Mai and Chiang Rai at luxurious Anantara properties. Sadly, even though I had pre-informed about our early check in request, there were no replies via emails. Due to the huge surge of check-ins, we were made to wait for our rooms by roaming the area and only managed to complete our check in procedures for the 2nd room at 5.30pm on Day 1 for our Kallang Rooms. Since they insisted on not participating in Bonvoy, we didnt get any room upgrades nor breakfast even though we are Platinium Elites. Our card keys were also not working when we tried at the door and we have to wait for another 45mins for the front desk to bring up newly coded card keys. We spent that 45mins waiting

title: Love the atmosphere here.
desc: Was attending a birthday dinner at The colony buffet. I lost my direction while searching for the restaurant, luckily I met a nice staff Dickson Soon to guide me all the way. Enjoyed the food here. ☺️👍🏻

title: Great room. Great view.
desc: Not the first time I stayed here. What is there that I do not like about Ritz-Carlton? I have always loved it! The room size. The humongous toilet/bathroom. The comfortable bed. Both I and my husband slept like a baby and had a good rest! My favorite is the bathroom! I could sleep in the bathtub! Really!

title: Great Stay
desc: We checked into Ritz-Carlton for a break from covid exhaustion (staying at home for long periods or going out with a mask all day can be exhausting!) and also to celebrate a birthday. Booking into the Marina Bay Club Room, the stay was the best out of the few others in this city that we had stayed. I was initially not bowled over by the interior of the Ritz rooms - it looked too business-like and the yellow-brown tone wasn't appealing. The pool looked boring. And that's why videos and photos are sometimes not a good indication of reality. I realised that the room was bright, fresh and very comfortable, and not at all aged. The feel-good factor in the room was high. The pool was probably the best compared to the other hotels we stayed before in the city, which was actually a

title: Poor service, not worth the price.
desc: I really only write reviews when the experience is exceptional or terrible - this 5 star hotel was such a disappointment. The rooms and the view are lovely but they do not make up for ludicrous inefficiency and lack of service. Be warned: the check-in and check-out is ridiculoulsy inefficient. We arrived late in the day, ie not at peak time but there was a long queue of tired and frustrated travellers waiting to check in at this very large hotel - the check-in desk is so small and staffed by two people. On the morning of our departure, a bill for a nights accomodation was slipped under our door despite us prepaying. I spent nearly two hours ringing on the room phone (after check-in, I wasn't going to join the queue in the lobby again) but astoundingly no one answered.

title: Excellent, classy, high quality customer service
desc: Excellent, classy hotel with superior service. Best breakfast ever with superb friendly and high qualify chefs and cooking. Shout out to Chef Sundar who went out of his way to educate us on south indian breakfast and customize this for us. Truly Ritz service- above and beyond, with touches of detail in room service, friendly and helpful concierge, quiet, classy hotel with views. Busy but never felt too crowded. Highly recommend for both leisure and business. Also well located.

title: RC Singapore is Good
desc: Allot to be said. The property has the potential to be world class but..... it is VERY good and that comment should not take away from the stellar team that works at RC. There genuine and commitment to service / hard work can be seen day in and day out. Nearly 4 months of living here nothing slips they eye. Lets start... The concierge team lead by clef d'ors Adam is stellar. Adam is a trove of information and wisdom. From high or low, Adam can point you in the right direction. Backed by Leena who is a joy and goes above and beyond to provide stellar service. Leena does not miss a beat. Kith, Hakim, the young lady A____ (forgot) are wonderful. The Door & Bellmen team are simply WORLD CLASS, kind, warm, generous and thoughtful wether its my daily run around the Marina to tell

title: Fantastic and Convenient Place to Stay
desc: The Breakfast hall was amazing - huge range. Room was spectacular as was the view of the Sands and city. Staff were fantastic. Really well situated, only a short walk to shops, the gardens, marina bay sands and F1. Staff were friendly and courteous.

title: Honeymoon
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the Ritz Carlton Millenia on our honeymoon. Amazing service from the warm arrival and congratulations from Dexter to the room upgrade to the stunning marina bay view. Our flight was also delayed by 13 hours and we arrived the following morning - to our surprise, they adjusted our booking (without us asking!) removing one night from the charge. They provided a lovely ‘cake’ made from watermelon as well with a thoughtful card - a perfect treat after our long flight. Highly recommend!

title: The most fantastic hotel ever!
desc: I had a good stay at the Ritz-Calton Millenia SG. Very clean room and very nice people! Especially, housekeeping shui yin and Man yee / chef Elvy / Colony restaurant Lee lee! You guys made my day :) I will definitely go this hotel again.

title: Long weekend
desc: Walked in at 4.15pm to check in along with the long line. Waited for 30mins in line to only know that the room wasn’t ready. So we decided to have early dinner. Got a call around 5.30pm that room was ready. Collected the cards around 6.30pm and went up to the room with a horrible stench smell coming from the toilet. Sewage smell!Faint! It threw me off that I was prepared to head home and ask for a refund. However, the counter Staff and the floor manager was very nice and quickly got us a change of room. The floor manager even brought me up to the new room to have it checked and helped with the luggage cause I have a kid with me. Thought I’d try asking for a late check out cause we got the room late and with the issues with the 1st room. Plus I was unwell. But unfortunately the

title: An Unforgettable Stay
desc: The first thing I'll always remember about our stay is the view from the room. I found it so stunning that it seemed like a shame whenever I'd have to close the window blinds. Equally unforgettable were the smiles and the service from the staff, which we experienced even before we checked in (we had arrived a bit too early, and were just expecting somewhere to store our luggage), during those wonderful meals at Colony, up until the moment we got into the shuttle for the airport. The warm welcome, the tips about seeing the sights, the thoughtful turndown service, and the over all attention to detail made our stay in this gorgeous property truly memorable.

title: Very Bad experience
desc: I am now staying at Ritz Carlton Singapore. It is the first trip for me after COVID 19 and I have been looking forward to it, especially when I know that I would be staying at Ritz Carlton. It has been a very disappointing experience since I checked in. The first day when I checked in, I found a half drunk bottle of water in the room, which was disgusting. Then I found the 2 plugs next to my bed didn’t work. Later in the evening, I found all the phones in the room were out of order too. Since it was very late at night, I waited until the next morning. The next day, I complaint to the hotel and the manger send a technician to fix the plugs but he couldn’t fix the phone. The technician said he would find someone to follow up, After all my activities on 2nd day, I went back

title: Best Hotel Ever!
desc: The best hotel i have ever stayed at. Amazing service. the Bedroom was perfect.we had the city deluxe room with most comfortable king size bed. its so close to everything that if you wanted to you could walk. it has a few restaurants which has really good food. especially the breakfast. so much variety. or if you dont want to buy food from their restaurants there is a mall right outside of the hotel doors which is very convenient. a must stay if you have the money

title: Love the Ritz Cartlon Millenia Singapore. They will spoil you!
desc: The Ritz Carlton is a lovely hotel. We used their airport pick-up service and were met at the airport promptly and driven back to the hotel where we were met with a warm welcome and taken directly to our room. Our room was spacious with an awe-inspiring view and at night it was even more gorgeous. The staff was attentive to any requests. We stayed on a club floor where they served breakfast and cocktails at the end of the day, but honestly, the food they served during cocktails was delicious and enough for a meal! I loved the location (and view) of this hotel. We were able to walk to the Gardens and Sands Mall and everything else was an easy taxi ride away.

title: Nice Stay
desc: We had a wonderful stay. Our room had lovely views over Marina Bay. Stunning at night. All staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Its a very busy hotel, restaurants within the complex can be very busy. We soon learned the best times for breakfast. There is a lot of shopping within a short walk from the hotel. We would definitely recommend this hotel to our friends.

title: This is a Fake Ritz-Carlton, dont come to this hotel if you come here for Ritz-Carlton
desc: This "FAKE" Ritz-Carlton, is a shame to call this hotel as Ritz-Carlton, as I felt this is only a 50 dollars worth hotel. 1. On the night of my stay, the hotel hot water system was down for almost 6 hours, it forced all the guests to take cold shower, which now caused me got cold. 2. Operation hotline, whenever you need help you needs to wait for 5 mins and no one pick up the call. 3. For the housekeeping, I called for the housekeeping to clean the room, they called me back and said to me, we are out of manpower so we can't come, you need to wait. If the hotel doesn't have enough manpower then don't operate so much room, since you can't keep the standard of quality. 4. The room cleaning is very careless,New tower with red colour and hair. 5. The attitude of the

title: Outstanding Hotel
desc: My wife and I stayed at the Ritz Carlton for 5 days as our regular Hotel in Singapore had no availability. We chose the Millenia Suite 1 Bedroom which was fantastic. Great staff, great food, great service. We have found our new favourite Hotel in Singapore

title: Hit: A spectacular hotel with amazing rooms
desc: Stayed here in November 2016. Our flight was so late that we ended up checking in very late. Hotel stuff was super kind and helped us rest and relax quickly following very stressful flight. What a spectacular hotel this was! Super modern and large rooms (particularly rare in Singapore)! My favorite was insane view from the bathroom. Food was to die for! Service second to none. Location was fabulous, and allowed me to explore Singapore easily. My husband went back a couple of times, and I am certainly looking forward to go back as well!

title: Lovely experience!
desc: Lovely location we an spectacular lobby and an amazing bar (fab cocktail list!). Our room was spacious and had a lovely view of the marina especially from the bathtub. Service was friendly and attentive. My only two comments would be that checkin process was a little slow and at breakfast they did not know what a flat white was.

title: Perfect hotel for business
desc: It was a perfect hotel for business trip. I stay for 10 nights at the club level. Staff were very helpful, food and drink at club lounge was good. I enjoyed nice view from the lounge. 10 minutes walk to Marina Sands and garden by the sea. Shopping malls are just nearby, very convenient.

title: Overall professional service with nice big room and good view
desc: Stayed early Dec 2022 in the lowest category room with a view over the Kallang basin. The room was 1303 on the 13th floor. Pros: -service is very professional and polished at this hotel. (more polished than say st regis, just have to compare as i had stayed in that hotel prior to the stay here) -check in man, Kanna helped us with luggage and sent it up to the room. he is amazing so nice and helpful and friendly. -We waited around 15 minutes to check-in as there were long lines on Saturday afternoon at 3pm. On the table on the side of the check-in area they had water, lollipops, mentos, chips that anyone could take. -room was big. -room had a nice view over the Kallang river and basin and National stadium and Golden mile complex and Tanjung Rhu area. -bed is big and

title: Friendly and kind staff to guide me to the exact location
desc: I’m rushing to meet my friends at the restaurant and somehow I can’t find the exact location. Met a friendly staff Mr Dickson Soon and he guide me all the way to the restaurant where my friend is. With his assistance, I’m met my friends and have great evening with them.

title: Excellent hôtel. Will be back.
desc: Really excellent hotel from every angle. Pros Great service all around - from check in to room service. Great pool that allows for laps Good gym I had a great wow experience - my toothpaste was almost finished and the cleaning staff noticed it and gave me a new toothpaste without me asking. Great way to anticipate client needs and create a wow experience. Great restaurants. Fantastic rooms and views. Cons Would be good to have a space that allows to sit down and smoke a cigar. Not the cigarette stand.

title: A Pricey Hotel, but definiately worth it for the first time visit
desc: This was our first visit to Singapore and we wanted to make sure that we had an exceptionally high quality experience. The Ritz-Carolton Millenia Singapore certainly delivers on all fronts. The hotel was beautiful and exceptionally well layed out. Its location is perfectly situated in the Marina area and the rooms are exceptional. We had a club level room, which provided us with a high floor and amazing views of the Marina/Singapore skylight. The room was well appointed with every ammenity one would want or hope for. The cleanliness of the room was perfect and we enjoyed both evening cocktails and early breakfasts in the club lounge on the 32nd floor. Check in took slightly longer than it should have, but this could have been because our desk person was being trained.

title: Room was not ready.
desc: I booked a single king bed through the amex travel website. I showed up around 4pm to check-in to find out that there were no king bedrooms available. They offered me two twin beds instead. I did not want the two twin beds so I had to wait an additional 2 hours for a king bed to become available. They offered their apologies but did nothing else on their end for the inconvenience. I was disappointed they tried to get me to take two twin beds instead of offering an upgraded room so that I could check-in immediately and attend to my schedule. I would expect a hotel of this level to accommodate their customers in this way. For that reason, I can not give this hotel a 5 star review. Other than that issue, the rest of my stay was great and the breakfast was amazing.

title: JUST MET MARK From SUMMER PAVILLION
desc: Thank you Mark from Summer Pavillion, taught me and my partner Where we should go. He suggested About Nice place for convenience.. Such a nice guy from Philippines, heard he is new from his work but he knows what to do, 😊 Hope to see him again in the future,

title: Not a Ritz Carlton
desc: I had stayed at this hotel 13 years ago and had quite liked it. I made the mistake of booking here again. The hotel looks extremely used and dated. I think in the past 13 years no renovation was done. The room felt old, was smelly and had a leaking toilet. First time in my life I stayed at a Ritz Carlton with an empty minibar. Staff seemed uncaring and unresponsive. I could not reach the reception or concierge by phone and had to go down on both days. Would certainly not recommend.

title: Wonderful service from mayank
desc: Mayank was of wonderful service to us at our lunch at colony. He was attentive and very helpful and most of all, always a very pleasant smile on his face when he served us. He brought my fiancée her birthday cake and offered to help us take photos and even a very nice video. Thank you Mayank for making our lunch date a memorable one. Wonderful!!

title: Amazing stay, and wonderful events team!
desc: I recently stayed at the Ritz-Carlton for a business trip and the stay was nothing short of perfection. The staff was so helpful, the breakfast was robust and amazing, and the events team was wonderful to work with for my large event that we hosted at the hotel. I would absolutely book again for a work or personal trip. Worth every penny!

title: Wonderful hotel with an excellent staff
desc: The hotel is superbly conveniently located in Singapore. It is quiet and well appointed. The view of Singapore’s harbor from our room was magnificent. The hotel’s staff is wonderfully attentive, pleasant, well trained, and thorough. Dexter in Guest Services in particular is an excellent ambassador for the hotel and indeed for Singapore itself. We look forward to returning soon.

title: Amazing service from Ajay!
desc: This is our second time at Colony, to celebrate our anniversary. Ajay was super attentive to our requests, meticulous and professional. His service was awesome. Our empty plates were cleared very quickly and he occasionally asked if our tea needs to be refilled & even remember what our favourite tea was by the end of our meal 😆 He also offered to take photos for us with the anniversary cake and put in a lot of effort to get the right angle and lighting for us. Overall a brilliant experience here at Colony.

title: Good stay, but poor lounge service.
desc: Second stay at the Ritz, service in lounge severely lacking. Pro(s): Upgraded to Marina View room on a high floor. Cons: Receptionist gave my friend the wrong card (we booked a club room) so he couldn't access the lounge and missed the afternoon tea. Service at the lounge was rather detached. I got the impression that perhaps the waiters/waitresses were rather inexperienced? For example, empty plates took a long time to clear in the 12-2/2.30-4.30 timings although the lounge was not very crowded. A waitress cleared the plates for a table in front of me, but somehow managed to overlook the empty plates on my table (although there were multiple empty plates on it) . My friend also commented 'pay attention to a few guests only' Surprisingly, plates were being cleared

title: A perfect staycation
desc: Thank you to the Ladies and Gentlemen at the Ritz Carlton for making my staycation cum special anniversary with my spouse a memorable one! The room is spacious and clean, with lots of daylight and spectacular view of the Singapore skyline. Special thanks to the Club Lounge team, especially Ms Jit and Mr Hamzah, for being attentive to our needs. Upon knowing that we will be having the anniversary dinner at the Colony, which is also the must-go restaurant for our special couple occasions every year, the team provides advice and support to ensure smooth transition from check-out to dinner time. The housekeeping team not only carry out the routine duties but they actually take note of the personal care items I have placed on the vanity top and took initiatives to place them

title: Amazing views and great for business, but service is poor
desc: Amazing views and useful location. Great business amenities (Club, large rooms, access to internet, outlets, etc.) Pool and gym are also quite good for business traveler. Breakfast buffet at Colony was outstanding. Staff is condescending and borderline rude. Use the hotel space, but try to be self-sufficient, download the Grab app, ride the subway, make your own reservations, and avoid interacting with staff!

title: Great service by Zoe
desc: Great service by the service team. Especially to Zoe who assist us during our stay in the hotel. She have provided an exceptional service, always checking with us on our room and where are we having lunch or dinner. Always concern of our well being. We will definitely be back for the next stay.

title: Demanded payment again after payment was made
desc: Checked in and redeemed a night stay with my amex voucher. Pleasant experience during check in and throughout the stay. Anniversary was acknowledged and a small welcome amenity was waiting in the room after check in. That was the end of the great experience Received an email on the day of my check out demanding that payment be made if not they will charge the room to my card. Ever gone to a hotel where they are able to deduct more than the deposit you have given? this is the place to be The manager on duty(Amirul)probably thought it would be better to ask the guest first instead of sorting things out on their end. Two hours after my reply, the assistant front office manager(Ganga) was sent to clean up the mess, allow me to quote directly from his email. "Thank you for

title: Checks All the Boxes!!
desc: This was our first visit to Singapore and we truly loved this hotel. It is well-situated in the Marina Bay area. Few minutes walk to Marina Bay shopping, the Esplanade, Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Flyer. If you are game to walk, it is about a mile to Riverwalk and Chinatown. The service is top notch; the staff very friendly and helpful. We were welcomed with fresh fruit and still/sparkling waters. Our room was spacious, well-accommodated and came with a lovely view (east-ish). We were here for 8 nights and the room never felt confining. If you want a view of the city, get a room on the west side. The breakfast buffet is pricey but wonderful: a lovely mix of east (yes! Congee, salted egg, and you-tiao!) and west-it fills all the cravings. The Colony bakery opens at 9 so

title: A Memorable Stay
desc: It’s our 1st staycation with Ritz-Carlton to celebrate our son’s 4 YO birthday. We booked the Ritz Kids Night Safari Adventures package with a 1-night stay in the Deluxe Marina room that offers the amazing Marina Bay Views. We had our lunch at Colony before we check in. The ambiance, the service, and the quality of the food were top notch. Time to check in and we were greeted by Dickson where he personally took us up to our room. The moment my son stepped into the room; he was over the moon. Special Thanks to Dickson & Team for the birthday surprise and arrangements. They had decorated our room with balloons and posters with the theme (Pokémon) we have requested. And even prepared a beautiful birthday dessert platter for our son. As he was exploring the room, there was

title: Brunch at Colony
desc: The brunch experience at Colony is absolutely delightful. The restaurant offers a cozy and inviting atmosphere that is perfect for a leisurely weekend brunch. The menu is diverse and offers something for everyone, from classic fresh seafood to my favorite laksa. The service at Colony is top-notch. The staff is friendly and attentive, and they go out of their way to ensure that guests have a pleasant experience.

title: Excellent Service
desc: We had our reunion dinner at Colony, and I have to say the service was excellent from start to finish. I would like to especially thank this young gentleman, Mayank, for his very kind and attentive service. He could neither speak nor understand Chinese, but did his utmost best to pronounce the Chinese words of blessings as he prepared the Yusheng for us. We all had a good laugh because he was so cute and entertaining and we sincerely enjoyed his efforts. Mayank made the entire experience seamless and definitely upheld the Ritz Carlton standards.

title: Christmas Stay
desc: Stayed over Christmas period for 2 nights and what a wonderful time it was! As a family of 3 we look for comfort and luxury during our holidays. Ritz ticked all the boxes for us. Great Location walking distance to the Marina Bay Sands where you find the best shopping and entertainment. Gardens by the Bay - one of the main tourist attractions. China Town and more, we've enjoyed our walks a lot. Iconic views of the Marina Bay Sands from our room we will never forget. Our 2 and half years old son called "Magic" :-) Our room was spacious, and we loved the decor, bathroom was superb, and the bathtub views breathtaking. The hotel was full as expected during Festive Season and the breakfast room felt a bit overcrowded. It was a very nice room & the breakfast was fantastic, huge

title: Way beyond expected, impeccable service
desc: Decided to give Ritz a try after always hearing my sister raving after Ritz when I was back in Singapore this time. I was not expecting much as it was just a short trip back to Singapore, but the hospitality of Ritz is definitely impeccable. I have never received such a personalised service from a Luxury hotel like Ritz. Dickson who replied to my emails really accommodated to my preferences and even came to check in on me during my stays to check if everything was as preferred. Dickson's reassurance on assisting me during my stay made the whole stay very smooth as I knew the exact person to ask from hotel services to touristy places around the property. Would definitely recommend looking for Dickson at Ritz for the best services during your stay at Ritz. Hotel property was

title: Always exceeding expectations
desc: Was back again at the Ritz for a staycation, and my favourite Guest Relations Dickson actually contacted me few days prior my stay to see if I would require any assistance during my stay at Ritz. It is great to have someone anticipating my stay at Ritz, just making the trip so personalised and genuine. The warm welcome at the Ritz front doors were (as usual) so inviting and just makes the whole stay wholesome. Republic had a new menu, which continues to spark my interests in their amazing selections of cocktails, and also never fails to impress me with their new additions. It was just another very homely staycation at the Ritz as always, with Dickson's consistent and detailed efforts in making sure my stay was comfortable and seamless.

title: NYE Stay
desc: Our family stayed over NYE for our first visit to Singapore. Absolutely loved our rooms with views of Marina Bay. We opted for rooms with the club lounge access which turned out to be a great decision. In my opinion one of the better Ritz-Carlton club lounges out there and worth spending the extra money on. Jithra and the team took great care of us. We had some meals in Colony which is just exceptional, great service, great choices and a marvellous cheese selection to finish the meal off. Lee Lee gave us some nice treats that weren’t on display which was very much appreciated. The rooms are a great size but definitely showing their age and are in need of renovating but I’d say the staff make up for it easily. It’s a big and busy hotel but since we had club rooms it really

title: Excellent Service by the Ladies & Gentlemen at the lounge
desc: We stayed at the Ritz Carlton again for our wedding anniversary again. We checked in on 29 November and checked out on 2 December 2022. We bought the room under the Stay 3 Pay 2 promotion. Sya from the front desk brought us up the Club floor upon our arrival so that we could sit down and relax while Dylian attended to us and checked us in. This time round, we were given Room 2222 which faces the Marina Bay. The room appears a tad smaller than the previous ones we had stayed in although the layout etc of the 3 rooms look exactly the same. Pros: The ladies and gentlemen at the lounge took great care of us during our stay. Cecilia, an ex-stewardess, made us feel really welcomed. Her years of flying added value to the guests’ experience. “First class experience!” she

title: Wonderfully Comfortable Room and Outstanding Breakfast Selections
desc: We had a room at both the Marina Bay Sands and the Ritz Carlton since our family of four needed two rooms since MBS maximum was three guests (although easily could have fit a fourth, but that’s a different review). The Ritz was located right across a relatively short walkway from MBS and about a 10 minute easy walk from the Merlion. While the Ritz is not iconic from the outside like the MBS, I would say the lobby and more importantly, the room, was better than the MBS. The room was very, very large with beautiful wood floors and massive windows. But don’t fret…the windows had separate automated day and night shades. The bed was very comfortable which is really important if you’re working your way through jet lag. Pro tip: get a room facing the downtown/bay…we had room

title: Fantastic property with excellent views
desc: The RC Singapore is hardly the newest hotel in Singapore but that doesn't mean it's any less impressive. While the building is fairly conventional in style, service is excellent and the rooms are fantastic. While the rooms aren't exactly avant garde they are wonderfully luxurious and huge. Our room faced the Marina with a bathroom overlooking the bay. Special shout out to the Concierge team in particular who was excellent and conversational, not rushing guests through the process. I would certainly recommend the RC Millenia for trips to Singapore.

title: Great location paired with world famous service and hospitality
desc: Stayed at the Ritz-Carlton in December 2022 for over a week while in Singapore visiting friends and family - arrived in Singapore in the early morning touching down at 5am after a red-eye flight and arrived at the hotel at 7am. Warmly greeted by staff and at check-in a particular mention to the staff - Cally who in many ways tried to get us a room ASAP as we were travelling with our toddler when the hotel was at 95%/full occupancy She was eventually able to get us a room at around 10am. Many thanks to her for accomodating us. Service at the Ritz was exceptional, prompt, responsive and world class. Ask and it gets done and done well. Newspaper, an extra towel or toiletries or making up of the room. Many a 5 star hotel drops the ball after the initial amazing impression but the

title: New Year in Singapore
desc: The hotel was magnificent over looking Marina Bay, We were there for New Years Eve, what a display 90mins of fire works lasers and drones, hotel sent wine chocolates and macaroons to the room to help celebrate. Hotel staff every attentive after 3 days bumped into Mahesh Vadivelu who remembered us from arriving,it makes you feel special. Food amazing location perfect for everything, use the metro very efficient and clean. The people of Singapore are some of the nicest you will meet anywhere in the world? Wouldn’t hesitate to stay again

title: Disappointing 5 star
desc: Check I. and check out service is very slow with super long queue. If the hotel is expecting high occupancy, should have factored in more resources. Was charged the room fees during check in and front desk wanted to charge me another round during check out! Had to show them my credit card transaction and they insisted taking down my credit card details to investigate. How can their system not show this transaction? Totally unacceptable! Although the room is clean, it is very dated. Questionable if this is worth your money. Guest floor corridor reek of foul smell, as if someone vomited. The only thing nice is their food at Colony.

title: Fabulous stay at The Ritz in Singapore
desc: One of the best experiences - stayed on the 30th floor and had access to the lounge which was unbeatable. The rooms are gorgeous and the location of the hotel is as good as it gets. You are right near the Marina Bay Sands and they have a car service which will take you in a certain radius. The food is amazing and the staff is great. Overall 10/10 experience!!

title: 5 Days at Ritz-Carlton Singapore
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the Ritz Carlton over Christmas . From the beginning until the end everyone was very friendly, attentive and very forthcoming. Especially Lavindran and Visay were very helpful and provided important information. The hotel was decorated beautifully and the breakfast and seafood buffet were definitely worth the price. We had a lovely stay and would totally recommend this hotel, which additionally has a great location .

title: Disappointed Stay!
desc: Overall disappointed with the stay and the amount paid for the stay!!! Should have used the amount to travel instead! My room 3111 aircon stopped working from 12am to 3am out of sudden during our sleep. The room was unbearably warm to sleep in during the outage. We tried to reset the Aircon but to no avail it did not work…We called for assistance but there was no technician on site to assist in the wee hours and hence we just to bear with it. Our room Aircon miraculously started working at 4am out of sudden but the Aircon was blowing air that’s not cold.. Further checks from the front desk in the morning confirmed that there was no aircon maintenance or Aircon outage happening during that period the outage occurred in our room and we should not have experienced this outage.

title: Great time and awesome service at Ritz Carlton Singapore
desc: We stayed at Ritz Carlton in a club room which gave us access to the Club Room on level 32. Helpful service and good vibes from all staff in particular Dhian, Lina, Sundar, Bernice, Biel, Hamzah, Jimmy, Cecilia, Farzana, Rifqi, Darshini, Shane and Vijay.

title: Amazing Hotel!
desc: We had an awesome time at the hotel. Lavindran Rajaram helped us from the begging to the end of our stay at Ritz Carlton hotel. He has been very helpful and friendly. The pool was fantastic! We had a wonderful time at this hotel and would definitely recommend this hotel for you!

title: Top of the top in Singapore
desc: We have been regulars in the Millenia for many years and this was our first trip back after the pandemic. There were some staff changes and we were eager to see if the hotel could still deliver amazing experiences. The Millenia did not let us down and exceeded our expectations again.
