The staff, the service, rooms, food and location make this a very unique property. I start with staff because the people of the Millenia are simply beyond amazing. Flawless service that goes beyond expectations make the stays here unforgettable. I recommend the club level rooms. The club provides service all day and several different meal services, the food is amazing and Chuck and his team in the club have provided such warm, attentive and personal service, it really feels like home. I have been

title: This place was absolutely amazing!!! True 5 star service here
desc: What a 5 Star experience with so many highlights and things to remember. let’s start upon arrival — The property has the quint essential arrival of any Ritz Carlton (and we have stayed at plenty of them), the look and feel of the property as you approach the drive is everything you expect at a Ritz, including the professionalism of the ladies and gentleman who greet you, and one in particular, Lavin. In our case, Lavin greeted us upon arrival and immediately with charm, professionalism and impeccable management of many moving parts, Lavin became our “go to” at the property and holds the position of Guest Relations Officer. Lavin personally took us up to the 32nd floor of the Ritz club for a personalized check in ensuring we had a care free check in and arrival. Through the

title: The ultimate view with service. ❤️
desc: What a wonderful hotel. The food, the service, the ambience! With fantastic staff and one of the worlds greatest views from the lounge, there is nothing I can fault. A big special shout out to Sathish who has been amazing with his service and recommendations. In the words of Arnie “We’ll be back!” ❤️

title: Consider other options in the area
desc: Knowing that the Bonvoy Platinum Elite status is not recognised by the hotel (not mentioning that you can't collect points or nights), we booked our 1-night stay through American Express Fine Hotels and Resorts in order to get similar benefits. Unfortunately, the upgrade turned out to be the same room, only a few floors higher. I checked availability online right after and the hotel could have offered a proper upgrade but it seems that the cooperation with American Express Fine Hotels and Resorts has low priority. This was certainly the worst welcome experience when it comes to my stays booked through this channel. I asked the receptionist a couple of times to see if there was a possibility to get an upgrade to a room with a better view or stay in the same room but get Club

title: New Year’s at the Singapore Ritz
desc: The most beautiful hotel set right on the Marina Bay Sands couldn’t be more ideally located. The professional service offered to guests is above and beyond. The concierge level offers a magnificent experience in dining and comfort and amazing attention from the dedicated staff. The rooms are comfortable and well kept with magnificent views. A-trip I will never forget.

title: Gratefulness to Chris from Ritz Carlton Republic
desc: I completed my Standard Chartered 10 km run and walk into Ritz Carlton to wait for my friends Chris from Republic saw me and gave me a nice cold ice water and wet tissues What amazing service from Ritz Carlton Thank you Chris Will visit Republic soon.

title: 12/22 at the republic bar
desc: I remember LUNA's warm hospitality in "the public" bar a lot. Thank you for congratulating me on my graduation! Thanks to you, I was able to spend my graduation trip more meaningfully! Once again, thank you for your warm consideration.

title: best experience
desc: The guy named Lavin was awesome ; super friendly , best hotel experience ever. Catered to all my needs , if your in singapore this place is a must . Food also really good, lots of restaurants in the hotel.

title: A Fine Dining Buffet
desc: If there is such a thing as fine dining buffet , the Ritz at Singapore would be it. Service is almost a server per table, food was not only fresh seafood but constantly replenished. We had wine and this was unlimited with an upcharge. The variety was vast.

title: Impeccable service and breathtaking view
desc: The staff of the hotel are impeccable. Do take a room with a view of Marina Bay. A view to literally die for. The negatives are the decor of the room is really quite dated. And the shower badly needs a shower head that is mobile, i.e. fixed to a cord. Rather than just a shower head fixed to the wall.

title: Amazing stay! We will be back!
desc: Thank you so much once again, Mr Dickson Soon, for a wonderful and memorable stay for my parents’ Wedding Anniversary. We enjoyed our stay tremendously! My elderly parents cannot wait to share their great experience with others. They were in awe of the beautiful spacious room with a breathtaking view, the genuine warm welcome surprises and superb breakfast spread! Appreciate you going the extra mile! The impeccable service, dedicated professionalism and special personal touches from you and your team, during this special Christmas staycation, gave us many good reasons to return to Ritz again! You have outdone yourself once again! Kudos & keep up the amazing work! Thank you!

title: New Years in Singapore
desc: One of the best experiences we’ve had traveling. The hotel is beautiful and the staff was amazing. I cannot recommend the Ritz enough. Singapore was a thrill and the new year’s fireworks were the best I’ve ever seen. We’ll definitely be back.

title: Really memorable stay to celebrate mum’s birthday!
desc: We booked Ritz to celebrate my mother’s birthday and it was an amazing experience. Ritz had given us an upgrade to a suite and it was just the most beautiful room with a fantastic view of Marina Bay. As we had 2 grandkids staying with their grandparents, they prepared cute tent beds for each of them and the kids loved it so much! The Christmas atmosphere was also really great! The kids received a cute little package with little candy canes and lollies, colouring book and a cap and also kids toiletries! This time around, the service was also impeccable. Although check in with a little slow (we waited around 20mins) the staff were very attentive and apologised for the wait. For room service, they sent up more bottled water at their own initiative. The service staff Deepan somehow

title: Nothing fancy. Waiting Game
desc: Check in u need to stand and wait for 30 mins. Slow front desk. Long Q but only 2 front desk open during my check in. After check in continue to wait 30 mins for your room to be ready. Call operator from your room wait for another 20 mins for someone to attend to you. Went swimming pool wait for another 20 mins for LIFT to arrive. Finished pool u wait for another 20 mins for LIFT to go back to your room when ure still wet. Check out timing wait another 30 mins for the LIFT. Cant imagine if ure rushing flight. Reached lobby check out saw long Q. So opted for express check out by using the form and envelope that Ritz put in my room in the morning. Passed the form to the receptionist at express check out station and she asked me what is the form and envelope about.

title: Customer service
desc: It's an fantastic stay with the exceptional great customer experience from the club lounge service staff. Special thanks to Dhian, Satish and the group of staff members. You made us have a memorable staycation. Thanks

title: stunning marina bay view and downtown skyline, exceptional hospitality
desc: recently stayed in the club level during weekend, with the last visit before pandemic glad to experience the resume of the almost the same service as before. Personally, the best view of the marina bay area at the top floor of the hotel. Breakfast in the one of the best restaurant across the island, Colony, with variety of delicious dishes. Though filled up with guests in the club lounge during weekend, the staff remained attentive to almost every individual, that I really appreciate. Met the manger in the club lounge of whom I met during the last visit. All the good memories of past experience staying in the hotel flashed in my mind again. Hope I will come back in near future.

title: Top class service!
desc: This has been one of the best hotel stays I've had. The people who work at Ritz is what makes this place special, making you feel comfortable and welcomed wherever you go. Room is as you would expect, spacious, beautiful interior and amazing bathtub with view to relax at the end of your day. Would highly recommend and would love to come back when I visit Singapore again

title: The most amazing stay at Ritz Carlton Millenia
desc: What a lovely week at the Ritz Carlton. We were welcomed the minute we stepped out of our car after a long and tiring flight by Harrison who whisked us up to our room to do the checkin process in the comfort of our room. He was extremely friendly, professional and had the best suggestion for us to try a local hawker center as we arrived late and the restaurant was already closed. There’s 24hrs in room dining but we opted to go out and explore the city. The rooms are very spacious, clean and the marina view is definitely worth the upgrade. The entire team of concierge is by far the best team of Ritz concierge I’ve experienced. And I’ve stayed at most Ritz properties. This one went above and beyond in every way. Adam Teo was the definition of class and old school elegance in

title: Loved it
desc: What an amazing hotel with outstanding rooms & service The views from the club lounge were just fabulous as was food drinks & service, special mention to Sam in the club lounge who made us feel so welcome & looked after us so well during our 4 night stay you are a star ⭐️ we definitely be back

title: Super Staycation
desc: Stayed for two nights with the family to celebrate my wife’s birthday. Booked under Fine Hotels and could check in early and check out at 4pm. Unfortunately, the rooms were fully booked and no upgrade was available. However, check-in was smooth and the kids really liked the snacks at the reception. Ritz really know how to keep the kids happy - even when they have to wait. The really nice thing was to allow the kids to go around the hotel to get stamps and redeem an ice-cream at Colony. Everything at the hotel was really good - room was clean, daily housekeeping was done exceedingly well, breakfast was excellent, view of Marina Bay was mesmerising. Above all, all the staff were very friendly and accommodating. Overall an excellent stay and would certainly be back again.

title: Great location
desc: We stayed in a room on the 25th floor with fabulous views over the Marina area and out to the Gardens by the Bay. From our hotel we could easily walk to Marina Bay and the Gardens beyond. From just across the road we got the bus to Vivo City (gateway to Sentosa) and to the Orchard Rd shops. We took the metro (just a short walk away) to the Botanic Gardens. The hotel is huge but staff still manage to provide warm, personalised service. The rooms are well planned with high quality fixtures and finishes and the bed was very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent with seemingly unlimited choices and the buffet dinner at Colony was worth the (high) price. So much choice! I recommend skipping lunch so you can sample more of what's on offer and be sure to leave room for the delicious

title: Outstanding hotel-- top notch in all regards!
desc: My wife and I recently stayed at The Ritz in Singapore a few days prior to a cruise departure, and we had a phenomenal experience at that hotel. It is a spacious, ultramodern, clean and inviting hotel in walking distance to the sites, including the Mall and Gardens in the Marina Bay Area. The hotel also has its own beautiful modern sculptural art collection. We arrived earlier than the usual checkin time after nearly a full travel day from Miami, and we wanted to start exploring Singapore as quickly as possible after a shower and settling in. The efficient and friendly check-in staff was top-notch, providing without delay a spacious, sleek room facing the gorgeous Marina Bay. The staff at the hotel is top notch! The concierge is knowledgeable, the wait staff is excellent in

title: Wonderful stay & great service ❤️
desc: It’s my third time staying with RZ Singapore. Every time we are being well taken care by the Guest Relations team & the Front Desk especially Ms. Dora & Ms. Katie who are awesome 💜 Can’t wait to go back again 🫶🏻 highly recommended RZ no matter for staycations or overseas travels.

title: Colony Restaurant - The BEST of the Best buffet in town.
desc: Best of The BEST buffet in town. A must to visit at least once! Value for money for very Fresh, Quality & Delectable spread of buffet. 2nd visit within 3 weeks, Fri & Sat Seafood dinner (menu may differ slightly depending on weekday or weekend spread. Go for the weekend session though it will be a wee bit more expensive but totally worth it). Recommend seafood first, beef dish of the night, other meat & veggies selections and lastly dessert in that order. Menu-8 pages so must strategize choice of food because I can never ever finish trying all even if I have a piece from each dish. Service was excellent throughout. Let me start with Ms Loges who showed us to our seats. Very welcoming with a great smile. I felt like I had 2 personal servers (Mr. Abishek and Mr. Rahul). They were

title: Super nice staffs 👍
desc: Special thank you for Kevin - an Indian staff at the front desk , he takes care of me and my cousin very well . My cousin’s back was in pain after getting off the plane , I told Kevin about it and he arranged car , chair etc for us . He takes well care of us during our 5 days stay at the Ritz-Carlton. All the staffs are very nice , friendly and helpful. It’s my first time visiting Singapore, I am very happy and feel lucky that I choose to stay at the Ritz Carlton . The club lounge staffs and the lady manager who’s from Canada are all super kind , friendly and helpful . If I ever go to Singapore again , I will definitely stay at the Ritz Carlton and hope to see the same staffs again . They are like new friends to me . Thank you very much !

title: Always a great stay.
desc: Great hotel, walking distance to Suntec City and even to Marina Bay Sands. MRT is a 5-10 min walk - everything is walking distance for this hotel. The rooms are huge and they have a nice view of the city, most of all at night! Service is top notch and the food they serve is great. I particularly liked the Hainanese Chicken in their room service menu. Always a great stay at Ritz Carlton Millenia!

title: Hidden Jem
desc: You cant judge a book by its cover. Been to so many hotels in SG but always ignore Ritz Carlton bcoz the exterior looks so plain and old. But since its last min we just try it. Ohhh My. It really shock us. Inside is nice. The room view amazing. The food is so good. The staffs all great. Special thanks to Yu Tan from the receptionist for giving us a very nice room with great view and for also writing us a lovely letter w/ chocolates. To Kola Sandeep his very helpful in attending to all our room needs. To the 2 filipinos in the pool who help attending to my kids needs and serving the foods quick. We didnt expect to have a great time here but we did. bcoz of the good staff this hotel have that keeps the hotel looking great and making sure the guest enjoyed their stay.

title: 5 Star buffet with a 7 STAR SERVICE!
desc: I have been to Colony Restaurant for a few times. I love the selection of food and ambience. My recent visit would be the BEST EXPERIENCE! We are assisted by Ms. Tin and we had an awesome dining experience from the start of our Lunch until we leave. The restaurant was busy and full so I thought that the service will it a bit down. Ms. Tin came to our table explained the buffet set up and the “must try” on each station. She checks on us very promptly. All throughout our dining experience we feel like we in a FINE DINING RESTAURANT!⭐️. The napkins are changed once soiled, cutleries are changed and we don’t need to ask anything as she offers everything before we ask it. She is really a new found Gem in Colony. We have another reason to come not just because of the food and

title: Mum and Daughter stay
desc: We had the most wonderful stay. Everything was perfect, from the arrival check in, room, staff, and the amazing offering at breakfast. Dickson Soon and Carolyn from the VIP guest services team went above and beyond to ensure we were looked after in every way. Make sure you go hungry to breakfast as the options are endless and fantastic. A truly delightful stay.

title: Great way to turn 50!
desc: Chose ritz Carlton to celebrate my 50th birthday and it had been fabulous every step of the way! Had a massage at the spa, one of my best, only to be rivalled with ritz Carlton Bahrain! I received flowers, towels, chocolates, cake from different departments of the hotel. It’s been very special! No regrets! Oh and the view is spectacular!!!!

title: Staycation #2 (2 adults & 1 infant)
desc: Wonderful stay. Pleasant & lovely staff at all areas of operation. The Room Aircon thermostat could be better. Quicker operation for temperature adjustments, option for soft/hard pillows Sadly wasn’t able to swim due to the weather. Exceptional service from the front-line team to retrieve lost/found items. (dated 24/1/23 @1.20pm)

title: The BEST New Year's Eve I have
desc: The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore has the best room view for the New Year's Eve fireworks in Singapore! I am 1000000000% serious. FYI. the view of the pictures is from the room that faces marina bay, 24th floor.

title: Inconsistent Experience
desc: Well located with 3 min walk to 2 neighboring malls and 10min cab to Marina Bay Sands, but 20min cab from main Orchard shopping area. Stayed 1 night at end of trip after staying at the Hilton at beginning of trip, plus stayed at Marriott Tang Plaza before as comparison, experience turned out to be average. Notified counter with a wobbly toilet bowl, with maintenance addressing while going out, didn’t turn out to be address post return. Speaking with reception person K on duty on shipping service, informed hotel didn’t have Business Center; when asked where would be a FedEx or DHL, googled and replied service would be 0.4m away and finished discussion. With mask on coupled with a low voice for a reception counter, not an acceptable guest experience. Room otherwise was

title: Excellent service from the Colony staff and concierge
desc: Got excellent customer service and experience all around especially from the concierge and the restaurant. Special mention to John of the Colony restaurant. He was very attentive & recommended great selections from the buffet for us to try.

title: EXCELLENT HOTEL CLUB ROOM
desc: We booked a club room, was given room on 23 rd floor with great views, room was very clean and spacious with great amenities, in the club room there was all day offers for breakfast, afternoon tea and drinks and canopies, Would like to Thank SAM in the club roof for his great service and knowledge of the area, All staff in this hotel were very helpful and always happy

title: Happy experience
desc: The service of John at Colony Restaurant was superb and excellent, will definitely go back with the awesome experience. I appreciate the ambiance and the cleanliness of the whole hotel. The location was very accessible. They really live up to their value proposition of giving that memorable experience.

title: An amazing place that is a home away from home
desc: Thank you for all the staff who have made this stay so amazing. The club staff who have made us feel so welcome like Sam and Cecilia and of course the wonderful management team for their attention to detail and for having such a high bar to make sure everything was more than perfect.

title: One night stay
desc: Super helpful staff, top tier breakfast buffet. Very nice area to grab drinks with bartenders who are very knowledgeable. Concerige staff Super helpful with recs and helpful with anything that you might need to make your stay the best one.

title: Hotel stay
desc: Staying at this hotel has been one of the best experiences I've ever had. The people were very kind and friendly. They make sure to start up small conversations and remember small details on follow uo conversations. The sevice was incredible. The room itself was nice and beautiful. It was kept very clean and had a nice size to it. It had any amenities I could possibly need l. I highly recommend this hotel

title: Great view, location and service! 10/10!
desc: Been in Singapore a couple of times and have tried staying at different hotels. So far, Ritz-Carlton is one of the best, considering their excellent service esp. Ms. Dianne Agbayani, who gave us all our needs and more - all in all a wonderful accommodation experience. Our room was just enough for five people and it had a huge window overlooking Singapore's super highways and the bath has its own view and lovely window too. Although their toilet's still do not have a bidet, they were generous with the hotel supplies/toiletries. The A/C and lights are very manageable unlike other hotels that are either too cold or too hot. The staff were very helpful, courteous and honest. I love that they even gave us complimentary gifts to make our stay extra special. We will surely come back

title: The RC Experience
desc: The service in the Club Lounge was excellent. Sam and Cecelia as well as the other staff provided us with an unmatched experience. They were very personable and went above and beyond to be sure we were taken care of. The food is excellent at the Ritz Carlton and the Summer Pavilion restaurant is a must visit! There is no better view in all of Singapore than the one here. We highly recommend staying here. We’ll be back!

title: Memorable stay as always!
desc: We stayed at the ritz and opted for the club lounge access on our visit. It was amazing. Ritz was everything you would expect from amenities, service and comfort. Club lounge experience was amazing. Chuck and his team went over and above to ensure we were comfortable and all our requirements were met. There is a free flow of champagne and tasty refreshments throughout the day. The team ensured we had everything we needed and always to hand to give advise and suggest things for us to do. Hamza as always was on point with his service. Looking forward to come back soon!

title: Best hotel in Singapore ;)
desc: We loved staying in The Ritz carlton. It was impressed with the service of Lavin❤️ and all of the staff in the hotel. If we visit to Singapore once again, we will definitely visit the Ritz once again 👍

title: RITZ JAN 2023 BEST EVER STAY
desc: The staff at the Ritz were unbelievable. They provided personal attention and care. They were attentive to our every need. Special mention should go to these excellent guys: Sam (the best and cutest) Sathish (very funny, handsome and sweet) Dharshini (friendly and sweet). Farzahna (friendly and very kind) Issabella (very professional and helpful) Chuckie (best club manager ever and very handsome) Will definitely come back!!!!

title: Great people
desc: I spent 6 nights at the hotel just before Lunar NY. The highlights were the people, specifically Kit and Martin. Kit at the concierge is fantastic. She guided us to a wonderful restaurant in Little India and a unique design shop where we found very distinctive clothing. Martin at the bar is so welcoming and nice. And he makes a terrific drink! In addition the food at the summer pavilion is really yummy.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Traveling on business and stayed at the hotel for 6 nights. We were warmly welcomed by Adam Teo and were so impressed by the guidance and advice from Kit at the front desk. Kit is charming and very well informed on the best restaurants throughout Singapore and additionally gave us the best shopping advice. She a wealth of knowledge. After a day of meetings Martin Villarreal at the bar made us feel even more welcome. Great hotel and the mostly lovely people.

title: Best club in Singapore
desc: The rooms have all excellent views of Singapore. The beds are so comfortable and when having access to the club lounge you will be pampered as never before. Ask for Chuck, Sam and Sathish and you will enjoy every minute there

title: Amazing Stay and all helpful
desc: We had an amazing stay at the The Ritz Carlton millennia , Singapore and the front desk team in the front of the house lobby team was superb and amazing. Thank you too Prakash, Sundara, Sundar, Siri surrender on the, thanos, entire kitchen theme, Ganga and front office team. I’m la mugam. What is

title: Awesome stay at Ritz Carlton Singapore
desc: We had an awesome 4 night stay. Had high expectations staying at The Ritz Singapore and it delivered on all fronts. The staff were outstanding and couldn’t do enough for us especially Bernice and Hamzah who looked after us every breakfast and set us right for the days ahead with great recommendations and just genuine friendly warm service. We can’t thank them enough for making our stay so pleasant. We had tossed up between Marina Bay Sands and The Ritz and so glad we made the decision we did. Will be hard for any future holidays to match this level of service but we will be back for sure. Also great outdoor pool which our 11 year old really loved and rated 10/10.

title: It’s pleasure to stay here
desc: Stayed here for a couple nights. There is an everything about hospitality from the entrance. Nice concierge Lavin was very responsive and initiative during all my stay. Everyone in this hotel is interested to you have a best experience. Thank you to all staff. Room is clean, the view is like a dream. Inroom dining has been delivered in 25-30mins both times. Cocktails in Republic bar are great and waitress was helpful and nice to speak with. So I felt like a welcome guest here.

title: Wonderful experience thanks to dora
desc: Visited ritz carlton in January and requested for special arrangements to surprise my girlfriend and was attended to by Dora.. Amenities prepared were excellent and was really surprised by the special arrangements. Special thanks to Dora! It was a very memorable stay and will definitely return again and look for Dora.

title: Fabulous! 5 star service !
desc: Beautiful hotel with fantastic views of Marina Bay. The location is perfect - public transport is not far away and lots of things within walking distance. The staff are incredibly professional and discreet and unbelievably helpful. Although it is not a small hotel it feels intimate and staff remember the smallest details - it is very much appreciated. The bar is beautiful. We are in the Chinese restaurant and the food was excellent. The pool area is also really lovely with great service. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

title: Good experience in general
desc: Very good hotel , nice room , beautiful view, nice location, clean . Friendly staff the only thing is that they take a long time to deliver the luggage to your room when you check in . I would recommend the hotel for friends for sure ! A fair experience.

title: Beautiful Inside and Out
desc: Ritz Carlton already made an impression, right from the start. Location is very strategic. Walking distance to top attraction. Exterior has good architectural demeanour. Interior part has wonderfully placed displays of expensive entities. Food from the Chinese and buffet restaurants are very much. The room of mine that has marina bay views are just excellent. Amenities abound. Functionality evident. It was my birthday celebration, forced on me by my family. But the hotel staff made sure it won’t be forgotten.” Headed by Dexter of concierge. Then Bryan of housekeeping. Then Dave the pool attendant. Pardeep of room service who made sure I was greeted on midnight side on. Dale from Colony also helped. Good wifi speed. Excellent breakfast.

title: Ritz Carlton Singapore Club Room breakfast - the best
desc: Have to give a shout out to Bernice and Sundar for exceptional service during our breakfast this morning. They treated us to something that we weren’t expecting and provided us with a surprise treat which was so cool. Thank you indeed, it was a very special experience.

title: Best Hotel!
desc: We have booked a 3D2N Family package staycation to celebrate my wife’s birthday and the wonderful experience already began even before our stay! Dickson personally contacted me before the stay to check if we are celebrating any special occasion. Upon knowing that I am planing to celebrate my wife’s birthday, he has gone out all length to make sure the stay will be a special one for us. While making sure my wife is the star of the day, he also make sure that our 7 yr old son is not neglected! Providing him his dedicated snack and treats that he still fondly remembers till now. Throughout our stay we were constantly showered with his warm hospitality that we have not experienced anywhere else. He definitely has created wonderful memories for our stay at RC. So much that we are

title: The Colony outdid themselves! Seriously the best seafood buffet restaurant in town.
desc: Visited Colony for their Saturday dinner seafood buffet. This was my 3rd visit in 6 in months and the occasion was to celebrate my wife's birthday and our wedding anniversary, which happened to falls on consecutive days. This time round, there is a noticeable leap in service and food quality Our Lady serving us this evening was Frecel and did a proper introduction of herself and the way she did it was very polished and a harbinger that the evening was going to be wonderful. We were not disappointed at all. Both Frecel and later on Tin jointly made sure that our toddler was well taken care of throughout our 2.5 hours of dining by going out of the way to ensure she had food and beverages and made recommendations even (pasta station) for our kid's meal. All so that the

title: Service at the best level
desc: Excellent service by Tin and Frecel at The Colony. Good selection of food and quality of food is high. For the price level, it is worth the money for the overall family experience that we should all go for.

title: Thank you RIRI & JIT!
desc: Absolutely such a wonderful stay ! Ritz Carlton Singapore really knows how to pamper their guest making them feel most comfortable. I would like to personally give a special thanks to Riri and Jit for their wonderful service and making my special day even more memorable. Thank you to the amazing service and staff . DEFINITELY RECOMMEND if you are hoping to celebrate special occasions:)

title: Will definitely come again
desc: The foods and environment are great! Staff are friendly, and Mayank is very helpful and kind, made us felt welcome and warm for the dining! We are here to celebrate our friend bday, and Mayank made his most efforts to accommodate our request, cake with name on, we really appreciated it!

title: Dinner review at the Colony
desc: Went to the restaurant, Colony, for dinner and would highly recommend it! Excellent service especially by staff, John, who gave great food recommendations throughout the evening. The seafood spread was fresh and I love their dessert selection too!

title: Great Hotel and experience
desc: We have stayed here after spending a couple of weeks in Australia with family. I can honestly say this hotel has exceeded our expectations. In a world of of reviews this really has been a positive experience. We have been fortunate to stay within the Club lounge experience which has been exactly as expected, not full of demanding people, just a vey pleasant experience and we’ll worth the additional outlay. A very big shout out to Sam in the Club lounge who made the best old fashioned cocktail which really did impress with delivery and taste. In summary a great hotel, location and what an experience experience for a Singapore Virgin.

title: Gracious hospitality
desc: Every year on my vacation trip, I would schedule to have a at least 3 nights stay at the Ritz Carlton Millennium Singapore to enjoy its gracious hospitality. I always choose to stay at the Club Lounge Marina Bay view room because of the spectacular view especially at night. The Club Lounge offers very good champagne and desserts, and I am always pampered by the Club Lounge staffs especially Jithra, Sam and Sathish. I must compliment on Chef Sundac’s fried eggs at breakfast which are the best among all the hotels which I had ever stayed for breakfast. I love the Ritz Carlton because I always feel very much welcome when I stay there. Lavin from concierge always recognises and greets me. Dickson who is the VIP Guest Supervisor always comes to greet me during my stay to ensure

title: A weekend in Paradise
desc: From the minute we arrived until we left the stay was fabulous. The staff helpful, non intrusive and welcoming. We could not recommend the hotel more. We would particularly like to mention lunch at the Summer Pavilion which was exquisite. Breakfast at the Colony is also a must. If you are lucky enough to go to the Club the staff are brilliant.

title: Great service..great food…
desc: Staff Mayanks is very friendly and approachable. He loves his job by serving us with full of gladness. And he was able to memorise our names😅😉 When it comes to food..we really enjoyed it..from appetizers to desserts🤤🤤🤤 Highly recommended..we’ll definitely going back to Colony👌👍🫰

title: First class
desc: Lovely hotel and we had probably the best room we’ve ever had. A lovely club lounge where we could have breakfast and snacks in the early evening. Very courteous staff and the views from the room were wonderful.

title: Colony restaurant Best BUFFET and with OUTSTANDING service!
desc: Went for a weekday lunch in Colony. The food spread was amazing as usual. What really impressed us today was the service we received from TIN. She is outstanding from the introduction of buffet line, cleanliness of our table and luxurious service experience. She noticed that one of my guest looks cold she immediately offered a pot of tea and scarf. She really carries herself very well that represents the luxury from Ritz Carlton plus she has a very positive attitude and engage with us consistently to check on our needs with a smile on her face. She even informed us about the seafood buffet on weekends which we will definitely go back to try. BEST SERVICE EXPERIENCE! Thank you Tin.

title: Club Room experience was excellent
desc: We recently stayed at the Ritz Carlton Singapore in one of their Club Rooms and enjoyed extremely attentive and friendly service from all the staff. We would like to especially acknowledge Sam and Cecilia for the way they both treated us while we were there and some great tips for sightseeing and shopping. We will definitely come back to stay again. Thank you so much.

title: Just excellent in every way
desc: This was our first visit to Singapore, so we had done quite a bit of research before we left to chose what attractions we wanted to see and not at least find a good hotel. After spending four days at the Ritz-Carlton, Millenia we could not have made a better hotel choice. From the minute we arrived until we left for the airport, we were taken care of by the extremely professional and friendly staff. We had a Marina Bay view room on the 30th floor with Club Lounge access. The view over the bay was just magnificent, and the Club Lounge on the 32nd floor was a gem. Here they serve breakfast, light lunch, afternoon tea and in the evening hors d´oevres, hot food and desserts. All complimented by champagne, wine, beer, cocktails and non-alcoholic drinks. In the Colony restaurant

title: Just the Best Place we have ever stayed
desc: This Hotel will hold a special place in our hearts forever. Especially the Unbelievable genuine hospitality shown to us by Dora and Dixon, we will never forget it. We are definitely going back to this hotel in the near future for a longer stay. And the breathtaking view of Marina Bay is So Special.

title: What an extraordinary experience!
desc: My son and I stayed for 8 nights and were deeply impressed by the warm welcome. The staff there is amazing and does an excellent job! From the first moment, we were more than happy that we chose this hotel. Beside the beautiful interior and the impressive art collection, we were blown away by the ambience. Our spacious room faced the Marina Bay Sands Hotel. What a cool way to wake up and have this amazing view from bed, we definitely don't have views like this back home in Austria! Also our bathroom had the same view. But most of all we write this review because of Jerald, our room attendant. We stayed in a lot of prestigious hotels over the past 20 years but we have never met staff that was as attentive as he is. Jerald always had a big smile on his face whenever we met and he

title: My favorite hotel in Singapore
desc: The Ritz-Carlton Millenia has become my favorite place to stay while in Singapore. Perfect location and great service. Can't wait to my next visit. PS: Even if you are not staying there, do come for the Sunday champagne brunch - one of the best in Singapore!!

title: Best buffet service!
desc: Best service by Frecel and Dale…. highly recommended! Food are all fresh and very nice, cozy ambiance. The best dessert selection, chocolate, ice cream, thai dessert, name it! Will definitely be back soon witt my sis!

title: The Most Outstanding Service in Singapore 🇸🇬
desc: We had a Great sunday brunch at Colony Restaurant. We would like to Thank John and his Team for giving us a REMARKABLE and UNFORGETTABLE Brunch Experience. John greeted us Happily at the entrance and welcomed us like we know each other for a long time, while walking towards our table, "he open a conversation with us, and start with "how's our day" From there he learned that this is our first time at colony, and guest what? Despite of being busy, he offered a mini tour for us on the buffet stations. It happens that he also work on the same place we're we seated. He took care of us genuinely from the beginning til end, he never fail to engaged with us and provided our needs, makes us comfortable, changed the silverware, napkins, not only our table, but the entire side of the

title: Good memory at The Ritz Carlton.
desc: It is the best restaurant in Singapore. The staff is kind and the food is diverse. The taste is of course delicious. The staff who took our seats is very kind. His name is Mayank Jugran. Thank you for making good memories

title: What a stay!!!
desc: I had the most wonderful stay. Everything was very clean and pretty. Great atmosphere, great hospitality. The staff was the most amazing part of my stay. I have to say, Dave in particular was such a joy to talk to. He's kind and funny - great to talk to. After we met by the pool, Dave provided outstanding service and pleasant conversation. He helped me with directions, trip ideas, and figuring out the taxis. For the stellar experience, I would like to thank the Ritz and Dave !!! Would recommend wholeheartedly.

title: Simply The Best
desc: Stayed here a few times over the years , the location is very central close to the business district and walking distance to MBS. The room is very spacious with great views from all sides . The best thing about this hotel has to be the staff . They are always warm and friendly in every interaction. A big shoutout to the gentleman at the door and driveway they are always helpful and professional even at the busiest of times. Can’t wait to return again soon.

title: The BEST Staff - Truly Unmatched
desc: Bear with me while I sound really snobby but: at first I really didn’t want to stay at the Ritz - it just isn’t really my vibe. But I ended up here and when I tell you - they have the best personnel I have ever experienced, it’s true. They would leave personalized notes, chocolates every night when they made my bed for turn down service and that’s just the beginning. Even their interns (shout out to Chris!!!) are the best. Definitely stay here - you won’t regret it.

title: One person can make a difference
desc: After several decades of travelling around the world and being a fan of Hyatt properties, I nevertheless choose the Ritz Carlton Millenia for my visits to Singapore. Indeed, service is among my most important criteria when choosing hotels. The Ritz Carlton Millenia has always offered me a warm feeling of well-being despite time differences and job stress over last 20 years. Thanks to all its professional staff and especially Mr. Dickson Soon, who knew how to anticipate the desire of the customers by making them feel 'back to their Singaporean home’ in this iconic property.

title: Colony Brunch Buffet Service
desc: My family and I were very lucky to have Ajay with us throughout the entire 12pm bottomless brunch seating. He was a joy to be with, and made sure we never had empty glasses. He was amazing, attentive and very patient even when we were tipsy!! Ajay is definitely serving 5-star all day! We are so happy to be in his section!

title: One of the best hotels I have ever stayed.
desc: I would first like to begin by how impressed I am at the customer service and care provided by the team at Ritz Carlton with a special shout out to Kevin, Joyous and Chris. These three truly made our stay very comfortable and relaxing. Joyous provided a quick check in process for us and was very helpful showing us the provided hotel ammenities and facilities. Kevin and Chris were both amazing and helpful always providing great information and knowledge of the history and culture behind Singapore. I can happily say that I will definitely be staying at the Ritz Carlton again and have been very pleased overall.

title: The colony ritz carlton
desc: Celebrated my son's first birthday at the colony buffet ritz carlton. We were assisted by mayank and john and they're were fantastic. Hospitality at its finest, not to mention the food its great as well!

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: This is truly the best hotel in Singapore. Not only is the location amazing, but the rooms are lovely and the service is next level. Nothing is ever too much and the staff at the club are truly amazing. I will definitely be staying here again and would highly recommend the hotel.

title: The best hotel in Singapore by far!
desc: If I could give a 10 star review I would! The service and amenities at this hotel surpasses all others in Singapore. The entire team are friendly, warm, polished, and professional, and they cannot do enough to ensure your stay is exceptional. Special thanks to the Club Lounge team for going above and beyond in every respect, and making the best Singapore Slings, smoked Negronis and Kir Royales on the island. We are already planning our next trip!!

title: Exceptional service
desc: The service from the Club Lounge team is exceptional: friendly, thoughtful and professional. Truly the best Singapore Sling and Smoked Negroni. Also very helpful making bookings for activities and restaurants.

title: Amazing Service
desc: A 5 star hotel should have all the expected luxuries, cleanliness and location. The Ritz Carlton has this of course, but what put's it shoulders above is the amazing customer service. Attentive, but never overbearing. It's as though the staff can anticipate what you want and need and deliver every time. Hat's off to the recruitment and training of one of the best customer-centric crew's in the business - and a special shout-out toDickson Soon the VIP Services Supervisor.

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: One of the best hotel experiences. Excellent room with a beautiful view, kind services, and delicious food. We were particularly touched by the honeymoon event they prepared for us. Bus station and MRT station are very close from the hotel as well. Everything was perfect and we want to visit this hotel again.

title: Fake Ritz Carlton….very dated and stale 5 star hotel….shame on Singapore Tourism Authority to allow them to stay open!
desc: 1. Lobby smells like stale reused detergent in a public toilet. 2. Checkin took 45 minutes 3. We were not welcomed as part of Amex Fine Resorts and Hotels guests nor did anyone bother to introduce us to the Amex Platinum perks. We had to demand them. 4. We were lied to when we demanded the Amex platinum upgrade and they said we were already upgraded. I rechecked our bookings and we were not upgraded. 5. The bath towels have seen better days and years and scratched my body. 6. The Millenia Square skywalk has signs of all the hotels that connect to it except Ritz Carlton. 7. At breakfast we were given a table next to the kitchen till I made an issue about it having seen the tables 50% empty. 8. No butler service for this remarkable brand even for the suites. 9. They don’t

title: Disappointing experience… very unlike Ritz Carlton brand
desc: They talk about addressing themselves as “Ladies and Gentlemen” …. If you HAVE to use this hotel avoid a manger called DOUGLAS HENG. Rude uninformed not flexible and was simply there to interrupt and prove me wrong although I have proof on how Amex platinum Fine Hotels and Resorts works. Overall disappointing. Lobby reeks of chlorine from the fountain. Rooms service is way too slow. No butler service .. not well trained staff for “The Ritz Carlton”.

title: Our stay at the ritz Carlton was great
desc: The stay was amazing!!! And who made it better was Natasha from guests relations.. such a lovely attitude and she’s the reason I want to come back again 🥰 so welcoming and kind… Such a great hotel with amazing location and atmosphere

title: Club level excellent
desc: We were staying in a club level room. The Ritz Carlton always provides excellent service and this was no exception. The club is a lovely environment and the staff are excellent , going above and beyond normal service levels. All staff from the club , including the chefs, took particular care and interest in making us comfortable. In particular we would like to thank Wan Ning, Ayumi and Hamza ( the coffee maestro) for being so attentive , welcoming and accurate in their service. A special thank you also to Adam on the concierge desk who worked out our dinners despite the jammed valentines weekend.

title: Thumbs up for spa
desc: The spa was great. Ann was stand out good. Knowledgeable, experienced. The hot stone massage was sublime. I look forward to returning. It’s not easy to find a therapist who is also able to guide you on how to address kinks in your body.

title: Good experience
desc: First time to stay in Ritz in Singapore. Business trip stay and found very tidy and modern room, great in-room dining, with a terrific view over Marina Bay. Staff are very professional and friendly, and always willing to help. Location is convenient. Good restaurants and facilities. Easy to get a taxi to go around. The hotel is good for personal stays too. Sufficient space in the room and easy to do some office work if needed. Gym etc are all good. A stay with very good experience and will definitely come again. Highly recommended for private and business travellers.

title: Balinese Massage at the Ritz-Carlton Spa, Singapore.
desc: I had a very good Balinese massage at the Ritz-Carlton Spa, Singapore this afternoon. The room is nice and comfortable. I also enjoyed the hot lemongrass tea which was served after the massage. Thank you Anne for the excellent massage and professional service.

title: Club Lounge Extraordinary
desc: We enjoyed the Club Lounge. The attendants were very nice and attentive. Iyumi visited with us and gave some ideas on local attractions to visit. The food and wine was very good. The lounge was very clean and the views of the city and harbor were amazing.

title: Love the lounge and the entire hotel
desc: Outstanding service especially in the club lounge Extremely well trained staff , they go beyond the call of duty We have been here many times over the years and it’s a wonderful hotel. Prices up a bit this year but they do not gouge which is appreciated Aiumi and Jessica were wonderful support

title: Would I return? Yes. Would I receive 5 star service? No.
desc: I booked marina bay view rooms & overall I would give the hotel view 5 stars & service 2 stars. I find the hotel seem to have communication issues amongst themselves: I checked with front counter regarding my buffet dinner booking & was told it’d be charged to my room & I wouldn’t need to do anything. After I left my dinner, Colony called my room to chase for payment & then said they could charge to my room if I wanted to. I booked the Auspicious Beginnings package & it wasn’t delivered to my rooms until I called to request for it. Even then, I was passed between departments & i actually had to read from the hotel website when they asked me what was included in the package. To say the above two incidents were embarrassing for me would be an understatement. They however

title: Compliments to Carol Lim (The Colony)
desc: I’m writing this review to compliment Carol Lim from The Colony for her wonderful service. She was very friendly and served our table in a very patient and respectful manner. There was focused attention by Carol and we were attended with the utmost warmth as she also took the time to ensure that each of us (4 pax) had our drinks that we each individually wanted. There was quick service and we all had a pleasant dining experience. Thank you for making our lunch enjoyable.

title: Wonderful
desc: Really enjoyed my stay at the Ritz Carlton in Singapore.The staff and service was excellent. Big thank you to Lavin for making our stay so great. Food was excellent and hotel was in a perfect location. Would definitely stay here again with my family.

title: Amazing visit to Summer Pavilion (Restaurant in Ritz Carlton)
desc: Went back to Summer Pavilion (restaurant on 3rd floor of Ritz Carlton) to celebrate Valentine's day. The food was mouthwateringly good as usual. While our usual favorite of scallop with eggplant was not available, we tried a new dish of scallop with asparagus, which was almost as good. Summer Pavilion continued to maintain their usual high standards for our other favorites too, including the poached fish noodle with lobster, poached rice with lobster, and abalone & mushroom dumpling in broth. What made the occasion very special (and keeps Summer Pavilion several cuts above other Chinese restaurants in Singapore) is the exceptional service delivered by their awesome team, with special mention to Chun Wai, Karen and Jia Yi. The team continued to impress by remembering all our

title: Colony Restaurant
desc: Great food and service. Plenty of choices. Seafood and sashimi fresh. Local and international items. Attractive desserts. Wait staff were hardworking. Special mention for John Michael - friendly, attentive and excellent service, an asset to the restaurant!

title: Lovely Buffet Dinner and Awesome Service Staff
desc: Colony is my absolute favorite restaurant, we have been here multiple times, and every time is an amazing experience all around. Thank you Lee Lee, Carmela, Chef Elvy and Chef Wei Leh for preparing a pleasant surprise for my dear friend, she was blown away when she saw the lovely dessert presented on the dining table. We were hosted by the delightful John and full of sense of humorous Raj who never failed to engage with us professionally and personally throughout the evening. Chef Andy was very sweet and accommodating to my request at the sashimi counter. I always take my out of town guests here, as the buffet menu and service staff are always superb. Definitely a lifetime customer!

title: Impeccable Service
desc: We stayed at the Ritz Carlton Singapore for a week and enjoyed their amazing Club room service on the 32nd floor. All the staff were incredibly welcoming and couldn’t help us enough. I understand that we are paying for a service but they went over and above. One young staff member, Wan Ning was delightful. Would definitely come back again. Great location over Marina Bay. Thank you

title: LUXURIOUS FEELING
desc: Dear GM I am writing this beautiful letter to express and describe my wonderful experience at Colony every time I come. I have visited Colony during pre-covid times. Firstly, I wish to commend and compliment JOHN for his great personal service. Whenever we were at COLONY, he would be very patient and detail in explaining to us the wines and food that’s been offered in the buffet. He made us feel very welcomed and as the time goes, we look forward to coming to COLONY as we look forward to his great service that made us feel at home and comfortable. He would try his very best to facilitate our requests and make everything possible for us. Then there was Tessa, we got to know Tessa as we come to COLONY more frequent and she was very professional and welcoming to us. She

title: GREAT SERVICE of JOHN (Colony)
desc: We had a great lunch in Colony... Im a return guest and I would say they maintain their service standard and i consider this as one of my favorite buffet restaurants in Singapore. All service staff were accomodating and hospitable. Hats off to these staff especially JOHN. Well personalized service. Great food and Great atmosphere!...We'll be back soon!

title: Excellent hotel, world class view from our room.
desc: Wow, what a view and wonderful service. Our room, 822, had a terrific view of the Marina Bay. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. Especially at the buffet breakfast, which has foods of various cuisines, including western, Japanese, Singaporean, and Chinese. Our travel agent was able to get us complimentary breakfasts, which saved us a lot of money. The hotel is located only a 5-minute walk to the Promenade subway station. After we learned how to use the subway, we rode it everywhere! One morning we awoke to see water dripping from the ceiling in the bathroom. We notified maintenance and it was fixed by the time we returned to the room in the afternoon. The room was spacious and cool. The shower was fine. There was a bathtub which we did not use. The room

title: Best lunch buffet with the best service in Singapore
desc: This is hands down the best buffet in Singapore. Every single dish was just of premium quality. The best part of my meal here however, was John and Mayank’s amazing amazing service. It made ALL the difference and it made my family and I feel so welcome. They were so attentive and proactive, simply top notch service. Ritz carlton management, if you are reading this, you have the best staff: John and Mayank in your team. Please give them the best bonuses and promotion!!! What a great experience overall. 10/10

title: Our second home!
desc: As always had an amazing stay, our home away from home! Top notch customer service from the club lounge staff! Special mention to Sathish, Sam, Hamzah, Jasper & Ayumi. Thank you! Looking forward to our next stay already.

title: Good massage experience
desc: Very relaxing massage from Ann and Bovy! Excellent technique and very polite. We came as a couples package after our wedding and they provided special congratulations as a surprise. We both fell asleep a few times.

title: Colony. Great Food. Great Service
desc: Its a great night we had at the Colony tonight. Everyone was very welcoming especially Frecel, Lyle and Dale. They all helped us with everything we needed, checked if we needed anything and just went beyond with the service. Will definitely recommended.

title: Exceptional Experience
desc: Exceptional experience, not only in the Hospitality Industry, but truly the top of the world quality. The communications are exceptional, exceptional, and exceptional! Top of the world! Beyond words of thankfulness to Dickson, Dora, and Liu Hui, who led the whole program before, during and after our stay with Ritz. There are so many details still many could be left out from what they have been devoting to, which I am afraid but must to express in my mother tongue only. 在举手投足间体现出的以人为本的价值观竟远远高于顾客至上、态度亲善的工作要求，让我们看到人性化美丽的一面。 The Ritz brand is a history and decent management value carried into our modern society, the fantastic room facilitated with comfy bed, wfh friendly furniture, and spacious bathroom. The elevator is doing its amazing job, and even the robot carpet cleaner lit

title: Not how a Ritz should be
desc: I decided to celebrate my 10th anniversary at Ritz Carlton Singapore because of our fantastic 9th anniversary celebration at the Ritz in 2022 and because I was offered a suite upgrade and free breakfast for 2 adults as a service recovery for my dismal last 2 stays. However, while there were some improvements from my past 2 stays, the hotel is still far from what a Ritz should be. Our troubles started at check in when the front desk agent checking us in assigned us a deluxe Kallang room with no breakfast, despite my bonvoy app showing a deluxe suite. We were then given a 4th floor suite with a lot of wear on the carpet, severely creaking floorboards and non functioning TV and Bose sound system in the living room. We highlighted the non functional TV to Ms Nazria Azinar, who

title: Great luxurious stay and spacious rooms
desc: Had a great family outing at Ritz .. the rooms are spacious (one of the selling point for me ) as it helped .. had enough space even with an extra bed in middle enough room to move around comfortably Customized kits for kids to keep them busy The room service paid enough attention to make sure we had comfortable stay and routinely refilled with water and other amenities We got placed in nice room on 29 floor and the views were great (not on MBS side ) but still can’t complain The huge bathroom also had a great view … Just make sure to roll the blinds down if you are taking shower/bath … The breakfast buffet we skipped as it was almost 60 SGD per person which was on higher side Swimming pool area is great and the attendants there are great as well … There’s a secret

title: Amazing experience
desc: Great experience at Ritz Carlton Millenia—- It all began at the fron desk..Melissa you are awesome thank yor for assisting us in a quck check in as we look so tired from walking under the heat of Singapose weather… and to all the housekeeping staff for providing our needs in a timely manner… we did enjoy ourselve in our brief stay in this 5 star hotel— 5 star experience indeed..

title: Good but cannot compete with our favourite hotel
desc: We stayed here a few nights on our way back from a holiday visiting friends and family in Australia. We would normally have stayed at the Mandarin Oriental but it was closed for refurbishment. As an alternative the Ritz Carlton served its purpose and had we never stayed at the Mandarin Oriental we would probably have been quite happy but there were some areas where we prefer the Mandarin. For a start the buffet breakfast is laid out in smal, quite claustrophbic, niches with low ceilings which feel quite oppressive and there is no outside seating area which we would prefer. All the staff though were very friendly and helpful. Even a young lady (Snow) who said that she was new was able to help us when we needed without reference to her colleagues. She had obviously been

title: Excellent Stay – Highly Recommend for the Best Views in Singapore
desc: Full (detailed) review to follow, but overall this was an exceptional stay. The Marina Bay view room is a must: It provides unparalleled views of Marina Bay Sands from huge floor-to-ceiling windows. You can see the Spectra water show from your window (weekend nightly performances) as well as a view of the Super trees Light Show (nightly at Gardens by the Bay). You can see Merlion Park and a breathtaking city skyline as well as a nice view of the Promenade. Check-in was seamless – what you would expect with a Ritz property. Be advised this hotel does not take part in the Marriot Bonvoy program, so enjoy just for the sake of enjoying. Again, as expected, the Ritz has large, beautifully appointed rooms with all the extras. The view from the bathroom was also wonderful. You

title: Birthday Staycation was awesome
desc: Went there with family (2 adults 2 kids) and celebrated a double birthday while at it (mine and kid's) at a birthday staycation, and informed the hotel - and oh my gosh were we in for a surprise. The room was decorated with balloons, the kids given colouring books, and the staff gave complimentary cakes and snacks for the occasion. The safari tent for the kids was so cute and an extra nice touch. Dickson and Dora from VIP had truly outdone themselves - they went above and beyond to make our stay a memorable one, down to the effort of personally welcoming us and escorting us to the room. I can't thank them enough for everything; the effort was in little details: from the flower petals on the king-sized bed to the safari toys for kids to keep them entertained... stay was truly one

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: We had a fantastic stay at The Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore. From the initial greeting upon arrival to the incredible room with great views of Marina Bay Sands and the harbor. Everything exceeded our expectations from the great breakfast buffet at The Colony to the helpful concierges. We will definitely stay here upon our return to Singapore. Thank you!

title: Exceptional Honeymoon Stay
desc: We had a fantastic stay as part of our honeymoon. We notified the staff of our celebration in advance and they got us a cake, card, and fruit basket for our room - in addition to an upgraded view of Marina Bay! The staff was exceptionally helpful in making our stay special. The bathtubs are extraordinary with soaking salts, loofahs, and huge window to bask in the view while relaxing in the bath. We booked using our AMEX Platinum Fine Hotels + Resorts credit so we had daily breakfast at the Colony buffet which had rotating global delicacies. We also used our included resort credit for the afternoon tea which was superb. The location is very convenient to all attractions in the Marina Bay area as well as a shopping mall next door for essentials.

title: Always exceptional!
desc: The hotel remains faultless. My husband and I took my parents to Singapore for 10 days to celebrate my father's 80th birthday. They had never stayed at a hotel of this caliber and we were simply blown away by the hospitality showered upon them by everyone they met within the hotel. We stayed at the club level and Chuckie and his team made both my parents feel as though they were the most important people in the hotel. Chef Sundar made sure we enjoyed all of the magnificent food offerings each day, and it is always a pleasure to catch up with Chef Benson who we met on our first visit 8 years ago! Every one of the ladies and gentlemen working at the hotel made this a truly special memory for me and we can't wait to go back.

title: Worth every penny!
desc: Extremely helpful and friendly staff who tended to our every need. Especially appreciated Dave serving up his homemade sangria recipe at the pool for my wife….delicious drink! Will certainly be staying here again next time we visit Singapore.

title: Guest Services going above and beyond.
desc: Great Service and went above and beyond. My wife left her phone in the cab when getting dropped off at a near by food market. We got back to the hotel right away and Hanafi from guest services was able to connect with the cab driver and arranged for him to return my wife’s phone. Hanafi went above and beyond to help us get the phone back and saving her a headache with resetting all her apps on a new phone. Not to mention saving her $1800.00 for a new one.

title: Amazing service from Frecel
desc: Came for the Friday night Buffett for date night. Lovely chilled atmosphere, great food and amazing service from Frecel. Highly recommend it. Asking me to write a 200 word review but I have already said all that is needed. Happy St Patrick’s Day

title: Wonderful stay
desc: The rooms are beautiful, with outstanding views on both sides of the hotel. Great location immediately adjacent to two malls with lots of food options. Close to main business district. Outstanding service. Thank you for a wonderful stay!

title: Club lounge outstanding
desc: Thanks to all at the club lounge especially Hamzah who is such a pleasure to talk to and helpful with any requests,such a great view over the bay and the meals are delightful we wish a big thankyou to all the staff on the top floor of the ritz carlton Greg & Daneille

title: Spectacular massage in Singapore
desc: We just had an amazing couples deep tissue massage at the Ritz spa. Zara and Ann were terrific. I highly recommend. We walked out totally relaxed and rejuvenated and ready to tour the city. Thank you ladies.

title: Masterly massage by Ms. Joy at Ritz Carlton Spa
desc: Masterly massage delivered today by Ms. Joy at Ritz Carlton Spa The massage seemed like Symphony at play. Ms. Joy was Master of the Symphony using her finger, palms, hands, elbow, knee, heel and toes to use art and science of massage to make every muscle, every nerve, every joint come alive and fresh. A masterly massage by Ms. Joy that rejuvenated a stiffed body making it ready for grueling workout in the week ahead. The Spa is worthy of Ritz Carlton Spa. Spic and span. Courteous front desk and facilities top of class.

title: Best service from Chef Wen Bin
desc: Chef Wen Bin offered to make some awesome fully cooked salmon sushi for my kids whom could not eat raw. Superb service! Thank you Chef Wen Bin… for your amazing service. Great service from entire team at Colony. Special compliments to Raj. Best customer service as always! Well done Colony and team. Excellent food with exceptional service!!!

title: Great hospitality
desc: First time to Ritz Carlton hotel at the door staff is very welcoming and we went to a famous Bar in Asia, Republic for drinks, Olivia and the team take very good care of us and explain the menu and design , nice drinks and nice environments. We will come back again

title: Family staycation
desc: I did a staycation with my fanily to celebrate my wife's birthday. After we checked out and went home, my wife realised that she had left her diamond earrings in the room. We contacted the hotel and managed to get her earrings back. Special thanks to Dickson and Aunty May from housekeeping for their help.

title: Memorable Hotel
desc: We were extremely impressed by the willingness of all staff to help in all areas. Special thanks to Lina Atan in Concierge who was so helpful with information to make our visit easier. In the event we return to Singapore this would be our hotel choice. Kevin Hayes

title: Enjoyable vacation
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our two week stay at the Ritz - Carlton. Enjoyed the friendly atmosphere in the Club Lounge for breakfast, dinner and the occasional high-tea. With a special thanks for the staff’s attentiveness, politeness and informative chat which made our stay really special and a shoutout to Hamzah and Zheng Rong. We will take fond memories back to Australia of Singapore and the Ritz - Carlton. Kindest regards Greg & Mike

title: Good time in Summer Pavilion
desc: Me and my friends went to Summer Pavilion have the lunch, we were really enjoy the time in there, Especially Keion and Laura have good service to us , Chun Wai prepare special drink for us , it was really good! When we enter the restaurant Karen and Siat Yin with warm smile and welcome to us. The team take very good care of us, we have good memory in here. Will come back again!!!

title: Simply the Best!!
desc: Why stay anywhere else? This is simply the best hotel in Singapore! The staff are so professional and knowledgeable and nothjng is ever too much of a hassle. I brought my nother this trip who required a wheel chair and shower chair. It was all orgsnised with no fuss! Thank Ritz Carlton!! You are amazing! Special mention to Mr Dickson Soon - thank you for making it so easy and enjoyable for my family and myself!! I will be back!

title: Amazing
desc: This was my first visit to The Ritz Carlton Millennium and it certainly won’t be my last. From the moment you walk through the door you know you are somewhere special. During my stay I tripped over my shoes and somehow managed to whack my head on the desk resulting in a nasty cut. On contacting the front desk they organised a paramedic / ambulance to attend. On leaving for the hospital my room looked like a murder scene! However, on my return it looked like it did when I checked in. I must thank the staff from the bottom of my heart for their kindness in looking after me, especially, Dora, Jerrol & Liu Hui. Would also like to extend my gratitude to Dexter for also looking out for me. I spent a bit of time at the pool which was stunning. It is very well serviced by extremely

title: Simply The Best Hotel In The World
desc: My wife and I and her parents have just returned from a 10 day stay at the Ritz Carlton Singapore. It was our 6th visit and the first for my in laws. After four years away (due to Covid), it was amazing to return to our favourite hotel. The service from the ladies & gentlemen remains second to none, from the moment that you arrive until the moment that you leave. Staying at Club level, we were all spoilt by the wonderful, attentive team under the wonderful Chuck De Guzman. Special mention must go to the delightful Isabelle who seamlessly made us all feel at home, friendly & informative, and with a smile that never left her face. She truly made our stay all the more enjoyable. Our thanks too to Hamzah, always at the ready with another Singapore Sling. Nothing was ever too much

title: Fabulous.Everything was great
desc: There was a mix up with our booking at Shangri La and we were treated very badly there. We secured a booking at Ritz Carlton instead and they were so nice. As it was last minute, there was no room available until later in the afternoon and we were offered complimentary coffee and cake while we waited and he added free breakfasts to our room. The breakfasts were sensational. The room was really fabulous - the height of luxury. All the staff were lovely and very attentive. I could not fault it. Would stay here again if in Singapore. Loved it

title: EXCEPTIONAL STAFF
desc: The hotel is beautiful and very well situated, and appointed. However, what is most notable is the warmth and sincerity of the staff. From Dexter's smiling face in the main lobby, to the wonderful staff in the Club lounge. We felt like Royalty with their superb service. Everyone of them just couldn't do enough to ensure our stay went smoothly, and it did! A special call out to Farzana for going above and beyond to help with my dietary needs, and of course, the wonderful chefs! THANK YOU to you all. Fabulous views and beautiful rooms are something this hotel has in spades, but lovely staff make ALL the difference.

title: Exceptional service in every way.
desc: After doing some research on our 8 day trip to Singapore we decided to stay in a club lounge access suite at the Ritz-Carlton. Best decision we made. Firstly, the staff are amazing. Cecilia and the crew at the Club Lounge are extraordinary in their ability to look after guests. Not only were the food and drinks catered for each of our tastes, the advice on what to do during our stay was spot on. Secondly, the hotel itself is beautiful and a joy to stay at. The pool was fun to visit, the artworks beautiful , and Republic (the bar) was exceptional. I highly recommend you stay here and we look forward to a return visit soon.

title: Outstanding Team at The Ritz Carlton Singapore.
desc: The most amazing experience staying at The Ritz Carlton. I emailed Dickson Soon prior to our visit to let him know that my Mum (87 years young) were coming to celebrate my birthday on the 10th of March, and my beautiful Sister's heavenly birthday also on the 10th of March, we were born 8 years apart on the same day. Sadly we lost Kerre last year and Mum and i decided to get away and have Special Mother and Daughter time to celebrate life and Kerre's passing. Dickson asked me to send phot's of us all. When we arrived our room was decorated with balloons, large photo's of us all, champagne and an amazing birthday cake. To celebrtae the night they booked us into the most amazing restuarant Colony. Wow!!!!! What a celebration, very emotional and also very joyous. Our table was

title: Best Buffet Restaurant
desc: I had dinner with my girlfriends over the weekend and had one of the best birthday celebrations. Aunty Lee Lee knew I was celebrating my birthday with another girlfriend and specially got the team to put together some special touches that made the dining experience so memorable. Once we were seated, sashimi were served to us and it was so beautifully plated by Chef Andy. Knowing we love spicy food, Chef Ang also personally prepared mala chicken and my girlfriends enjoyed it so much! Food quality at Colony is so good. Totally love the oysters, satay, laksa, fish maw soup and dessert counter. Elaisa, Mason, Mayank were serving our tables that evening and have been very prompt with service. They made sure soiled plates were cleared and water always refilled without us asking.

title: Excellent crew!
desc: Had a wonderful time at the Colony celebrating dear friends! Thumbs up to the excellent crew who made the celebration memorable. Special shout-out to Elaisa who made sure our tables are cleared to quickly to make room for more food and refilled our drinks; and to Mayank who took beautiful pictures of us. Thanks to Mason and Aunty Lee Lee who served us and added special touches to the celebration! Most importantly, Chef Andy, Chef Ang and Chef Vincent - for feeding our bellies! Thank you!

title: Special thanks to hotel staff: Suresh, Liz and Nas
desc: This is our first time visiting Singapore. The Ritz Carlton Millenia was the perfect hotel to serve as our home for 8 days. We had detailed service from the housekeeping team. Suresh was our room attendant, he payed attention to every detail. We were given chocolates and fruits. I was close to running out of toothpaste and he left us a new tube without me asking. Those small gestures set the service apart. I loved Liz who helped us at the pool. She was sweet and kind and gave us great tips for where to go in Singapore. Lastly, Nas gives the best massage, her kind demeanor made me feel even more relaxed. What a great experience. Oh Sunday brunch is a must. It was over the top. We will be back to stay again

title: Memorable family staycation
desc: We stayed for 5 nights at a suite facing the Marina Bay area. The view and the room was fantastic ! The housekeeping staff that looked after our room was also very thoughtful as I found they provided a mouse pad after they saw I was using a cardboard over the glass table ! Our kids also enjoyed the warm attention from the lounge staff. Thank you for attending to us especially to Anil, Jessica, Wan Ning over those afternoons there. We also had the opportunity of Sam attending to us and he demonstrated and made great tasting cocktails and sharing with us interesting stories ! Sam was exceptional in his service and we were very pleased with his level of professionalism. Thank you for the memorable stay at the hotel and the staff that you have made all the difference !

title: Best hotel ever!
desc: Our room was very spacious and had the most fantastic view of the Marina Bay. The staff were attentive and anticipated our every need. We also enjoyed the excellent facilities provided in the Club Lounge. We would definitely return to this hotel.

title: Honeymoon Perfection
desc: We were lucky to have a club room on the 20th floor, so we we greeted at reception from our car, so iur bags were taken to the room and we were checked in on the 32nd floor club lounge over a glass of champagne! The room, was large, spacious and light with views to absolutely die for, and that's before sunset. A very comfortable king-sized bed. Amazing. We preferred breakfast in Colony for the sheer variety. Service was second to none.

title: Charging delivery fees for room service!
desc: For the first time in my life I experienced being charged $5 for ‘delivery fees’ for ordering breakfast through room service. Hotels have the bad habit for charging exorbitant fees for everything but this is just taking it one step too far. Room service already comes with a 10% service charge and 8% GST and the joke is this is also levied upon the delivery charge. The room and bathroom is spacious and there are a couple of nice restaurants in the hotel. Even though it’s difficult to find a hotel in Singapore that provides great service and who would make sure that their guests would return again, I would really recommend against choosing this hotel that has no qualms of ripping off their guests blatantly.

title: Brilliant - always will stay here
desc: My wife Jackie and I returned to a wet and cold UK after staying with you for two periods in April. This is a note to say thank you so much for the experience we had staying as your guests.  Its a long way to come but worth the 13 hour flight to be hosted by the RC.  It was my wife’s belated ‘big birthday’ as we were unable to come during Covid.  From the moment we walked through the door every person made us welcome and special.  This includes the front check in desk, the concierge, the porters, our room attendant, the restaurant, the pool staff and the spa staff, the lovely doormen on way out to Millennia Mall (if I have missed any one – sorry).  Two people that went above and beyond were Katrina at the pool and Lina at the concierge.  Both were so great at their jobs.  Both

title: Amazing Food and Service at Summer Pavilion (Restaurant in Ritz Carlton)
desc: My husband and I went for our regular indulgence lunch at Summer Pavilion, and as usual, we got top-notch food and service. The Food - We ordered our favorite regular dishes, including the abalone + mushroom/scallop dumping with broth, braised king scallop with stuffed eggplant, and poached fish noodle with lobster meat, which turned out to be awesome as usual. Chatting with our host (Karen), we found out that these are amongst the "signature dishes" of summer pavilion, and they have a stringent quality control process for ingredients that has helped them maintain the exceptional quality of the food. Rating - 5 stars as usual (would give 6 if this was available). The Service - While some of the regular service staff were away, Summer Pavilion continued to provide exceptional

title: Hope to return soon
desc: Spacious rooms with a view over the marina which can’t be beat. A word of warning though: be sure to decline room ending -01. They are adjacent to the elevator which make hell of a noise. Whoever thought this was an appropriate accommodation for a hotel of this level should have to spend a night there. It was like sleeping on a subway. The real asset, however, is the club lounge with its air of quiet sophistication and the staff there. The view is dazzling, food excellent and Farzana, Faizal (to name just a few) and the cooks working the breakfast and dinner shifts (apologies for not remembering their names) are absolutely attentive and will go any extra mile to accommodate your wishes and make you feel at comfortable. It truly was a home away from home and we hated to leave.

title: Unforgettable stay in Singapore
desc: I stayed on 09 May and really enjoyed my staycation with RC! Thanks for personalised our experience with balloons and desserts. I would highly compliment Front Office Kevin who welcomed us on arrival and offered an upgrade for the anniversary celebration. The view for Premier Suite is definitely the best in Singapore.
