The bathtub view which able to see the Singapore Flyer are so stunning. And not forget the breakfast from Colony were amazing and the selection of breakfast was fantastic too. On the other hand, I would like to compliment Housekeeping staff named Li bai if not mistaken, for his attentive service to ensure our needs were met during the stay. Would definitely stay again in the future. Thank you RC!

title: Greatful for the services
desc: SARAVANA ( housekeepings) always keeps the room clean and tidy which makes our stay more comfortable and Saravana was really kind and always offer towels, water and chocolate. There cleaning service is 10/10

title: Great from the start!
desc: Our great experience started even before we arrived at the hotel. Dora from the reservations is a Star! She acknowledged our party size (with 2 toddler) and special occasion in the pre-arrival email. Upon check-in, we found that amenities for our special occasion was ready in the room, with a baby crib and Ritz Kids pack, totally fuss free! The service at the pool was attentive and the attendant was prompt to prepare the lounge chair shortly after we arrived. Breakfast at the Colony was great with good variety and there were plenty of ladies and gentlemen in the restaurant, ready to assist and ensure used plates are cleared promptly. Hope to be back again soon!

title: Pleasant stay with attentive staff
desc: Had a pleasant stay at the hotel. Staff are friendly ,they always smiling. We met Dora, a friendly and hospitable lady, who greeted, and brought us to the beautiful marina bay view room! She also prepared the birthday amenities for the kid!

title: Amazing Birthday Celebration
desc: I The service provided during my dinner at The Colony was nothing short of meticulous and delightful. My heartfelt thanks to Joanne Ler, who crafted a beautiful dinner celebration with careful attention to detail so that I could fully immerse myself in celebrating with my family. Special attention to Chef Ong Kim Hui, Chef Andy and Chef Sky who made such delicious dishes that I savoured thoroughly and Capt. Jega for the warm, wonderful and attentive service. I would also like to pay compliments to the Pastry Chef Vincent, who carefully created and molded a delicate red stiletto shoe birthday cake design. I loved the aesthetic design so much that I almost couldn’t bear to cut such a cake. Once again, I enjoyed myself at the Colony immensely and I can certainly see myself coming

title: Dated rooms but Brilliant staffs
desc: At check in, i had a few mishaps where the room i had was directly beside the lift and my room was located on a low floor despite being a Club guest. It’s saddens me that the receptionist at the club lounge was not able to cater to my preferences even when i received my keys for the room in the evening. With all that dissatisfaction and a really bad first impression i was not hopeful that anything can be done to make my stay better, I had to even compare Park Royal Marina Bay standard to the Ritz Carlton! All that changed when the assistant manager listened and took care of my stay. I was truly impressed by the level of service that was provided. He not only moved me to my preferred room which was away from the lift and at a high floor but upgraded my room to a suite!

title: great for cleaning room
desc: saravana arranged the room very clean and tidy, everything was placed in good order, the bathroom did not have extra water stains, the door was also very timely, clean spotless, neat clothes, giving people a good sense.

title: The Ritz shines in Singapore
desc: Great hotel in a great spot. The hotel is excellent, the gym and pool, great. The rooms great and the concierge, Kit, was great. Very helpful. The hotel is located in a spot that the view is great, and access to the walking around the Marina Bay area is super easy. Right behind the hotel are malls which are easily accessible from the hotel. Overall, great time and highly recommend. The buffet is also very good. Shout out to Loges who works at the restaurant reception area. Amazing service and reflects the highest standard in providing customer service. Her attentiveness and conduct definitely reflects what the Ritz sets as a standard. Really went out of her way to make us feel welcome and appreciated.

title: MAYANK IS THE SERVICE KING OF COLONY
desc: Decided to try out the dinner buffet selection at Colony with 3 other friends as we were celebrating our 7th anniversary of friendship. The food was great even though the selection was rather limited. What really made up for it was the service of one employee named Mayank. As soon as we sat down, we were treated with top tier care. Water was also filled up and empty plates were always cleared without having to ask. We also troubled Mayank to help us take photos and we were met with proper photo taking (that came with creative directions). It is obvious that Mayank loves his job and puts in his best effort to provide the best experience for patrons. Would come back just for the service.

title: Incredible views
desc: We stayed there looking for high quality service and amazing views, and we definitely got them! We had stayed at Marina Bay Hotel before and was great, but staying at the Ritz allows breathtaking views. It's within walking distance to Merlion park. Marina Bay and more. We took breakfast everyday downstairs at the Colony and everyday we could pick something different, as the variety of styles allows for that

title: Best Ritz so far
desc: Wow!! What a hotel, everything was 10/10, the staff so friendly, the food was amazing, must say best out of all the Ritz I've been including London and Honk Kong. The buffet choice never ending. I was like a kind in a candy shop. The boys at the bar extremely friendly and welcoming. Would definitely go back again.

title: Pure luxury
desc: My neice and i have just spent 10 nights at the Ritz-Carlton,Singapore and would like to say how much we enjoyed our stay. The hotel is beautifully decorated with a good pool area, restaurants, bar, gym and spa. We had a lovely de-stressing massage in the spa and would highly recommend it. The bedrooms are spacious with comfortable bed and the most amazing views. The bathroom is large with shower and bath and vanity unit and lovely fluffy towels. The Colony restaurant for breakfast has a wide range of foods, both Western and Asian which are execellent as is the service where nothing is too much trouble;. We can recommend the Republic Bar where you can get wines, beers and cocktails. We would especially like to mention Chris Shin and Camilla and Toni who always looked after us

title: Definitely book!
desc: We stayed at the hotel at the end of April as part of our honeymoon. We were so glad that we booked the Ritz. On arrival we were greeted by Gina who was extremely helpful in helping us plan our first day in Singapore. That hospitality continued throughout our stay with all staff going the extra mile and always wanting to help. We had a room on the 28th floor and had a spectacular view. Our room was cleaned by Myo Myo and it was always spotless. Breakfast was superb and the choice was second to none. I have a gluten allergy and staff were helpful in identifying which food I was able to eat. On one occasion one of the chef's brought out some gluten free corn flakes for me which was much appreciated. The only negative, if that, was that Breakfast was quite Location was

title: Loved every minute of our stay
desc: We are a family of 4 with two young children (6 & 3). The service, food and rooms were second to none! The whole experience was exceptional. From the moment of our arrival we were blown away by the staff and the lengths they went to ensure our stay was a memorable one. I could not fault anything at all. They even upgraded our room to a beautiful suite! Unforgettable- we will be back and a special thanks to Dickson.

title: Great building, good products with an exceptional staff!
desc: I honestly can't say enough great things about this hotel and it's truly amazing staff. Recently stayed (21 APR 2023) due to some airline issues and this stay ended up being one of our biggest highlights for the entire trip. The hotel is of course beautiful with amazing views, but that is expected. Everything was very clean and well cared for with a tremendous attention to detail. However, what really set this hotel above and beyond any other property we stayed at, was the people! I cannot rave enough about their superior performance and genuine care. Huge call out to: Dianne at the concierge, Jerrol at the front desk, and Logeshwarh at the Colony. My wife was not feeling well so I had to track down some medicine and food for her. Dianne not only had great recommendations but

title: Amazing stay! Accept greatness!!
desc: AMAZING TIME!! ACCEPT GREATNESS!! We had the most splendid time at the ritz Carlton! It was our wedding staycation or mini honeymoon if you will and what a time we had. If I could use just one word to describe the hotel it would be, ‘grand’. It is so grand and beautiful. I love the beautiful extravagant glass windows at the lobby as you enter, the beautiful, gently spiralled staircase too and the sculpture that hangs above inside the main foyer. This is one of the most iconic hotels in Singapore in my opinion. The bath tub overlooking the bay via the hexagonal window is just timeless. Yes the hotel is older now but you wouldn’t really know it as it’s so grand and they’ve kept it well. The service is impeccable too, for such a large hotel you’re getting boutique hotel kinda

title: housekeeping staff good cleaning all the time rooms thanks lot rize Carlton team .
desc: SARAVANA very good！very clean！very bang！thanks！客房服务非常好，打扫的非常干净，衣服叠好，被子叠好，厕所的毛巾全部换好，吸尘器洗好。我有不懂的问题也都帮我解决了，但是要两百个字，要求字数实在太多了。我后年瞎打一些，希望不要介意。总体服务特别的好。下面开始凑字数。绝对金额卡住了那会我不干嘛好的谢谢非常感谢感谢您好的好的对我的帮助。我会记得你对我的好，格局行。

title: Delightful tea and service at Ritz Carlton Colony
desc: We went for the high tea at Colony to celebrate our friendship of 11 years. In addition to 5 different varieties of delightful treats, tea, champagne and mock tails, Chef Bernice and Chef Wenbin surprised us with two sets of complimentary dish of salmon aburi to help commemorate this day for us. Their thoughtful and excellent service made this one of our most unforgettable dining experiences. Thank you and we’ll be back!

title: Just perfect!
desc: It was perfect. Very great experience! Very friendly stuff and every food was just delicious. The rooms are so comfortable and the view out of the Windows are incredibly beautiful. I can only recommend the hotel and would love to come back.

title: great time at the ritz carlton restaurant in singapore
desc: I really enjoyed the time with Mayank at the restaurant. He was really kind noticing piece. such as replacing cutteries and playe and stuff. and he often talk to me when i finish eating a dish. i can feel that he really takes care me. i really enjoyed time eating at ritz.

title: Top hotel, super staff with fantastic location !!
desc: We had a fantastic room, comfy beds and spacious bathroom. We had a very warm welcome by Dexter. He remembered our names throughout our stay (impressive) and took good care of us. We had the club room so we spend a lot of time in the club lounge which was excellent !!! Illya spoiled us very much and really made us feel very much at home. We stayed for a week so it was very nice to be pampered throughout our stay. Also other club staff like Scott and Ayumi were very nice and helpful. At the pool there was Luis who went for the extra mile and was very attentive and took good care of us ! Overall all the staff was super friendly and helpful. The Ritz carlton is a fantastic hotel. We had a wonderful time !!!!

title: Polished staff and accommodations
desc: Stayed at the RC during a last-minute vacation out of India. This is a well-run ship, starting with Yukki at the front desk who went above and beyond to check us in early, even though we only, hoped to register and leave a bag with the concierge. He went further when an apparent businessman hurried to the counter and tossed his keycard down, apparently oblivious to the fact that I was standing at the counter and conducting business despite his rush to check out In Dubai, businessman he might have been entertained, but Yukki calmly told he he was already helping a customer. A colleague stepped in from elsewhere and sorted things out, but thank you Yukki. The hotel is plush and as clean as expected for the rate. Beyond its walking distance to the Marina Sands and Singapore

title: Memorable stay: extraordinary services provided by Gregory
desc: Spent 6 nights here for business/pleasure and I must say that everything exceeded my lofty expectations. Special thanks to Apriliani and Gregory, whom I had the pleasure to meet and converse with, they both went over and beyond to make things stellar for our visit. I was hosting a business partner and friend, they both love the hotel and its impeccable service. We did try the morning/Sunday brunch, club lounge, and Chinese restaurant and they are all splendid in terms of quality and service. What really stuck out at this Ritz was their attention to detail and the personalized service Gregory and Aprilani gave us. Everything was arranged to perfection before our arrival. I did have a few requests during my stay and they were all handled flawlessly. The staff and service won us

title: The relaxation I needed!
desc: I had a massage and facial by Ann, who is FANTASTIC! I had been traveling on active excursions prior to coming to her, and she tailored my spa treatments to my specific needs (dry skin from air travel, muscle tension from activities). Her specifications were exactly what I needed.

title: Loved our stay in Ritz Carlton-Singapore!
desc: Friendliest and most accommodating staff ever. Hospitality at its finest, especially with Jamie, Katrina and Niko attending to us when we were lounging at the pool. Awesome experience, incomparable! Can't wait to share our stories with friends, highly recommended!

title: Memorable Stay, World Class Service
desc: First Class Hotel. Have always heard how world class Ritz Carlton is, until I experienced it myself, truly exceed my expectations. My boyfriend and I were pleasantly surprised by the warm attention and splendid care throughout our stay, especially by our impressive rooms executives Dora and Dickson. The dining options were excellent, we dined at The Colony & The Summer Pavilion. Not to forget the room itself, it’s beautiful, spacious and came with an exquisite bathtub where we enjoyed the view of the city landscape from. We will definitely be back!

title: Great views, amazing service, clean and friendly
desc: Great hotel, clean & tidy throughout, room service twice per day, really friendly and eager to assist staff, great location with awesome views of the bay ( we had king bed Marina bay view room) Amenities are great, really nice restaurants (although a bit pricey) foot access along driveway was poor and could be much better would highly recommend anyone to stay at this hotel. Will visit again

title: Wonderful Hotel - highly recommend
desc: A memorable time celebrating my wife's 60th, from the moment we arrived, the service from Dickson and his team and Chef Sundar was amazing. Our room was decorated to commemorate this special birthday celebration, and the champagne brunch on Easter Sunday contributed to our stay being one of the best ever experienced. Thanks once again and look forward to returning in the near future.

title: Best view in the city
desc: My husband and I stayed three nights here as a stopover and it was a luxurious experience. We chose a room with a view over Marina Bay and it has to be the best view of the city skyline. The bed is large and comfortable, spacious bathroom, and of course it’s the RC, so everything you could need is at your disposal cleverly tucked in drawers around the room. The breakfast spread at Colony is superb and the spa facilities are very good. Location is key here as one of the main subway lines is just around the corner.

title: Living up to the brand
desc: Prior to the stay, had informed the team that it was to celebrate me and my partner's engagement, Dickson and Nia was very responsive. Appreciate the help of Azarina who assisted in the setting up of the room. The moment I stepped into the Hotel, Risayd was very helpful and proactive, Atiqah/Ami/Kana Okabe were very welcoming and friendly. Ordered room service, and Glen was ever so helpful. The Team at the Colony were always ready to help as well, thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Ritz Carlton.

title: Bad check in experience
desc: Terrible to arrive on a red eye and be harassed by check in staff Nazxxx for a reservation number despite being an ambassador and waiting 10 minutes for him to find the reservation. The doorman had said he will come back to help us with my wheelchair friend - he disappears and we walked into the wrong elevator. Then we walk into a room facing kallang when we had paid $100 more for the room facing Marina bay. All wrong

title: We absolutely loved every minute of our stay!
desc: We have had the most wonderful time at the ritz in Singapore. We were treated with the upmost respect and generosity. The staff were amazing and made it most enjoyable for us. We loved the ritz Carlton club, it was a highlight watching the light show with a glass of champagne. We will 100 % cent be back. We loved every minute and are sad to be leaving!

title: Outstanding staff providing outstanding service!
desc: We planned to stay for one night, our fancy final night in SE Asia after an amazing 2+ week family vacation, but it turned into 3 after a messy flight cancellation with United. From the moment Dexter greeted us at arrival and escorted us to the club lounge to check in with Jithra, we knew knew we made the right decision to upgrade to the room with club access. The delicious food, high tea, top notch beverage options, but most of all the staff, made our stay so much more enjoyable. We've visited Singapore many times and have seen most of the sights previously, so for this visit we spent much of our time just enjoying this beautiful hotel. We just departed a cruise and arrived late morning so we didn't expect our rooms to be ready but the amazing Cecilia graciously served us

title: An alright stay, but room needs to undergo some major improvements
desc: The one-night stay we had at the Ritz Carlton Singapore was average. The room size was good and the breakfast at Colony was great. However, there are some pros and cons to this stay: Pros: - The room was big and with wonderful views of Marina Bay - Beds were comfortable - Concierge staffs are attentive to details and willing to assist whenever they can. Cons: - Rooms are aging. For example: - Wooden floor makes weird sounds all the time while walking on it. - Bathroom blinds came down and were unable to draw back up again. - Bathroom produces stinky smell over the night - The wait time for checkout is a bit too long when there are too many people waiting at the same time. Overall, the stay was average, but I can tell that the rooms are overdue for some major

title: thx for good time
desc: The facilities, food, and customer service were amazing!Also, the service was lovely! Especially Nicks and Katrina who met at the pool were very kind! Their kindness made me want to stay again. thank you for the wonderful time ^^ 素敵な時間をありがとう❤︎

title: Ritz Carlton, what more can I say?
desc: From the moment we entered the hotel, my partner and I warmly greeted by Prakash from the concierge team who gave us a brief orientation of the lobby level (frankly we were a little lost trying to find the check in counter). After being handed over to Brandon from the front desk team, the entire check in process was done smoothly and we were even given a free upgrade as we were celebrating a special occasion. Brandon didn’t have to give us the upgrade but the acknowledgment that we were celebrating a special occasion and the extra mile he took to make our stay memorable really personifies the Ritz Carlton service that makes the brand stand out from other luxury brands. My partner really enjoyed the view! Will also like to give a special mention to Haris and Katie from the front

title: Best hotel in SG
desc: I went to celebrate my sister's 10yr anniversary. They were so happy with service and view from hotel. Best hospitality service i ever had. Special thanks to Deepan and senthil for preparing an amazing room for us. I will definitely visit this hotel again. Thank u so much

title: The Ritz Carlton Singapore and Carolyn do it again
desc: I have not been to the Ritz Carlton in Singapore since 2019 (the pandemic did not allow it). I knew what I had been missing in an instant. The genuine hospitality, the highest levels of standards and professionalism, the experiences including food, the pool and gym and spa, all in the one hotel, a very special one indeed. I was also blessed to see Carolyn Rodrigues again, and was delighted that she was still with the Ritz Carlton, Carolyn continues to ensure the highest standards of herself and her team, and continues to leave her mark in a truly impactful way in such a special location, and I have no doubt she will do even more for the Hotel in the future. Thank you Carolyn again and it was a pleasure seeing you again (and see you soon of course). Tony Gorgas

title: Spectacular views.
desc: I have not visited other hotels in Singapore but I believe that this currently is the most beautiful one. The service is impeccable. We had an in room check in which is really nice because you’re more comfortable and can ask more questions about the hotel and the surrounding areas. Our concierge’s were the same people that checked us in and we’re always available to help us with recommendations on where to go or Any other local advice. Our room had the most spectacular view of Singapore ever. It was so stunning that on our last day, we decided to order room service and have lunch overlooking the bay. It was truly magical. At night you could see the lighting show and during the day we were close enough to visit local attractions and come back to the hotel to rest for a little bit

title: Must stay - unsure how I’ll stay somewhere else!
desc: From arrival to departure, our experience was above 5 stars. Gorgeous hotel in a great location for walking to Marina Bay, the Gardens, Clarke Quay, Boat Quay, Millenia Walk. We stayed in a suite with club level access which is where we spent every morning and every evening - the level of service, culinary expertise, and MAGNIFICENT views of the bay made our stay perfect. Don’t miss high tea in the club, it’s a must do. Not sure when I’ll return to Singapore but I will be staying here again!

title: Luxury to the Max
desc: Fantastic five star hotel with lovely rooms, great staff especially Mora in the club lounge. She really made our stay extra special and nothing was a problem. There was champagne made available all day. We look forward to our next stay.

title: Gave it a try, but a little disapointed.
desc: With the Mandarin Oriental (SMO) being closed during our visit we decided to give the RC a go. On the positive side the public areas (including the swimming pool) look great. Our expectation was the RC would be similar to the SMO or Fullerton in terms of quality, in reality it wasn't. Perhaps this was due to the hotel being very focused on conferences/events whilst we were there? Room was pretty dated although spotlessly clean. Club lounge was OK with good food offerings, service a little bit inconsistent. We were booked in for 6 days, but left after 3 - surprisingly no one asked us why or enquired as to whether we had a good stay. Unfortunately the RC didn't measure up to any of the other 4 hotels we have stayed at in the past in Singapore. I would guess they will be following

title: Wonderful experience 10/10
desc: All service s where provided in professional and friendly manner ,the club lounge experience was sensational extremely good value.The views are absolutely incredible and well worth insuring you face Marina Bay Sands

title: Fantastic staff!
desc: Wonderful stay, first time back since before COVID. Such an incredible hotel where everything is made comfortable for you. As ever, it’s truly the staff who make the trip so enjoyable. All were kindness itself. Special shout-out to Javier and Moira who were so helpful and attentive during our short stay.

title: Must stay!
desc: Everyone here is so kind and amazing at what they do! The views were incredible and whenever you needed anything, the staff were very quick and responsive too. I can't imagine staying at any other hotel in Singapore!

title: Sunday Brunch 😊
desc: At the Sunday brunch..as usual..food is great and service ..Tessa Reyes service is always on point on our many visits... I must compliment Jane Ellena today as her service is outstandingly great from the moment I arrived. Outstanding in service and personally and to the Ritz she is definitely a keeper and meant for better positions to come.

title: Treated Like Family from Start to Finish!
desc: This is now my favorite hotel in the world! Greeted like family when we arrived by the incredible Dexter, he felt like part of our family when we left - and even came in on his day off (and birthday weekend) to say goodbye and give us gifts. Dexter, the hotel, and other staff exceeded expectations from start to finish. (We stayed for a week in the Club Level and loved its lounge and it’s spectacular view.)

title: Fab, fab,fab
desc: Lovely stay. Your staff are extremely helpful and beautiful people. Fabulous room and amenities. Great location and close to all the singapore has to offer. Great pool and terrace area, large and function gym also. Cannot thank you enough for everything

title: Wonderful experience
desc: We really enjoyed every moment of our staycation with RC! The team personalised our experience with decor (we were celebrating a birthday and Mother's Day) and welcome desserts, and Dickson even kindly welcomed us in person on arrival. The bathtub was gorgeous and the room well-kept and clean. The mineral pool at the spa area was also very well kept and the Level 32 views + club lounge food were amazing. We especially wanted to compliment Dickson, Farzana, Faizal and Joel for going out of their way to ensure our needs were met during the stay. Priya at the spa facility was also kind and welcoming. All of them really took pride in their work went out of their way to meet our needs. Would definitely come again!

title: Thanks to the Club Lounge team
desc: Club lounge was a standout. Service is exemplary. Nothing was too much to ask. Many thanks to the team for a great few days. Pool staff also went above and beyond to make sure our every need was met. Many thanks

title: Happy
desc: 环境很棒，整理舒适，愉快的体验，1420。Room cleaning always great we are moving from my room after that cleaning is good.talking way is great.healping all the time doing great thanks lot housekeeping saravan doing job great

title: Amazing hotel at the heart of Marina Bay
desc: From start to finish this was an amazing stay! We were lucky enough to stay in a club room which I would highly recommend. The check in process was on the club room level with welcome champagne which was much appreciated after a long flight. The service at this hotel is exceptional. Although our room was slightly dated (plus we found some nail clippings from a previous guest next to the bed), it is the service and genuine care and attention from staff that really stands out. We had a personal concierge who went all out to make our stay so memorable. Dickson, who is VIP Services Supervisor went above and beyond for us. He ensured our room was decorated for our anniversary including complementary wine and snacks, he provided local food recommendations for hawker markets and even

title: Great experience
desc: It was fantastic experience with ritz Carlton Sg. Room was very spacious Food was amazing Very professional team Special thanks for Mr.Nikko and Katrina for their kind treat and great service.. Thank you all

title: Fantastic massage, great attendant, relaxing environment
desc: This was a super experience overall. My massage therapist Yani was terrific, a great mix of firm but patient, particularly while working on my difficult shoulders. The attendant Nara was also very attentive, bringing me tea and a snack while I was waiting for my treatment. Great staff, and a lovely facility

title: Bad arti dut Dr, Poor Dining experience & No Mariott points
desc: I came to Singapore with my family and we booked a total of 5 rooms for 2-3 nights. The rooms are nice and luxurious and the front office staff is overall hospitable. However, our dining experience has been absolutely miserable. When we booked online, we had some dietary restriction as majority of the family, being vegetarian. Now this was the only reason why we chose the rates over other hotels. However, they had some internal change in the menu that we realized after checking in and now the entire food menu has been completely changed. There are absolutely no to minimal vegetarian and international food options in “in room dining” with no options late night menu. The only reason we had booked the hotel was because of the international menu that was shown on the

title: Fantastic experience.
desc: I’m not one for writing reviews but the Ritz Carlton has certainly earned this very strongly positive review. I could not fault the hotel and room presentation. ALL staff were very friendly, accommodating, unobtrusive and most helpful, nothing was too much trouble and they anticipated our needs. The hotel felt like a second home. I highly recommend to all.

title: The best service you can receive! Come to Ritz Carlton Lounge
desc: We are back here again to stay with Ritz Carlton - highly recommend you to go for the lounge room. We received the best service here. It was top notch. The staff are so attentive, friendly, and totally made our stay here! The reason why we constantly come back to Ritz, is because of the service! Sam served us every year during our stay and he goes above and beyond in his service. Sahtish, Glendon, Dominic and Illyah - thank you too! Thumbs up!

title: Best Experience & Service!
desc: Best service from Sam, Sahtish, Glendon, Dominic, Illyah at Ritz Lounge! Impeccable level of professionalism & service from all the staff, really appreciate the hospitality. Will definitely be back because of them!

title: Unexpected Kindness!
desc: My experience at The Ritz was exceptional. Gorgeous room, amazing view of Marina Bay and friendly staff. I fractured my foot on the day I flew to Singapore and was wearing a boot and using crutches. I was approached by Assistant Manager Jing Wei and her trainee Ker Peng. They wanted to ensure I was ok and being taken care of. About an hour after check-in they stopped by our room to check on me . They brought me a bag full of gifts to cheer me up along with a lovely handwritten note. They gave advice on what to do and how to get around. They also let me use a wheelchair to explore Singapore. Their kindness and generosity touched me very much and helped to make my stay in Singapore even more memorable.

title: Avoid if your a bonvoy marriot member at any cost
desc: Tried emailing ritz again they still don’t allow or want anything to do with marriot bonvoy members we are titanium elite and they don’t even know what that is as there a marriot property but don’t want marriot members. So hard to understand we stayed at about 15 ritz properties over the last three years and in the last trip alone we stayed at 5 different Ritz yes a bit snobby but They treat you just like any other Marriott property yes abit of attitude but this one in Singapore is the only one in the world that discriminate against Bonvoy, Marriott members. there’s no special benefits you don’t get points for your Night Stays. You don’t even get Night Stays for staying there. Can you believe that?

title: Amazing hospitality, yummy food, wonderful stay
desc: Staff at club lounge were exceptionally amiable, constantly checking in on my family and my needs Special shout-out to 1. Ryan - who is so thoughtful and definitely went above and beyond my expectations. He took the additional effort to help find nice backdrop for our family photo. He even came to deliver a surprise champagne bottles with Cecilia to celebrate my birthday. Easily one of the best services I’ve received after staying at many different hotels internationally 2. During high tea and dinner/cock tail, we were also serviced by Moila who was brilliant in service. 3. Food served tasted great

title: Everything is good
desc: This is my first time writing review for hotel. I fell in love with Ritz Carlton during the first stay here! The moment i step into the lobby and greeted by all the friendly staffs all around, i felt the warmth and passion in them. With the quality of the room, the view, the location, the restaurant buffet, this is perfect! However, when i was checking in the 2nd time yesterday, bad experience fell on me due to a unhelpful front desk staff, Haris. I arrived at 2.30pm, my wife proceed to register and was told to wait awhile to prepare a non smoking room we requested. Waited til 4pm, i approached Haris. The reply i get from Haris was the room is cleaning and he is unable to let me know how long would the room be ready. So my question to him was, how long does it take to clean and

title: Ritz Cartom Singapore. Simply the best
desc: To the best staff at the executive lounge on the 32 floor at the Ritz Carlton. The chefs, Sathish, Chuck, Javier and our new friend Moira. Extra special mention goes to Sam. He is the epitome of service excellence !!! This is our third trip to the Ritz and it is because of the staff and excellent service that we have returned so often. Thank you again and all your efforts are noted and appreciated.

title: Unmatched customer service and location!
desc: The hotel location, staff, and food were unbeatable. We arrived at the hotel at 6am after our 16hr red eye with the expectation we’d have to wait to check into our room. When we arrived, Josh at the front desk had an amazing surprise- he had our room ready for us as we checked in. He doubled down on the surprise by unceasing us to a suite with the most amazing view. This act of auctioned service made such a huge difference to the start of our short stay in Singapore. We will be back to Singapore sometime soon and undoubtedly will stay at the Rtiz again.

title: Amazing Stay - New Favourite Singapore Hotel (Special thanks to Joel Yip for making our stay special)
desc: Excellent stay - by far the best hotel in Singapore. It is the hotel staff who really make the experience special. We had just arrived from another Ritz Carlton property (Koh Samui) where we had been double charged by accident. Joel Yip (Guest Service Agent) who checked us in was outstanding! He phoned the other property personally and we had been refunded by the time we got to our beautiful room. Joel also followed up and sent us a hand written note and small gift during our stay - just outstanding service. Really absolutely outstanding! The room was amazing with a stunning view of Marina Bay, Light Show etc. Great size for Singapore. Bed very comfortable and spotlessly clean. Bathroom very good. Housekeeping and room attendants also excellent. Facilities all

title: Great team creates great family day
desc: I’m grateful to Jaena, Glendon and Farzana who takes turn to keep my granddaughter very happy. The trio delivered very dedicated service and were extraordinarily attentive and sensitive to the needs of a child. It’s heart warming to see them hit off so well in such a short time.

title: Probably the worse 5 star hotel
desc: I must say, I've never come across a more appalling example of a so-called '5-star' hotel. My experience was nothing short of a nightmare, but what tipped the scales into the realm of the unforgivable was their laughable attempt at service recovery. Their solution? To pacify you with a complimentary stay, hoping you'll swallow your dissatisfaction and stop making a fuss. They'll go through the motions of CC'ing their upper management, but don't be fooled - none of them will lift a finger. I took the initiative to email their high-and-mighty senior management, but my efforts were met with a deafening silence by Riri Yufriane Apriliani (Assistant Director of Rooms) and James Png (Front of House Manager). What followed was a month-long email exchange, a convoluted dance of empty

title: Amazing Service, but hotel is looking dated.
desc: Firstly I would like to thank Dickson Soon from the Ritz Carlton team for making our trip so special. You went above and beyond right from the outset. Upgraded our room at no cost, decorated our room (as it was by birthday around the time we were traveling) and just made our stay so very comfortable. You are an asset to the company mate. The hotel itself is good, and very clean, but dated. Rooms are starting to show their age and the lobby and surrounding need a revamp. I was told a renovation was on the cards in the near future, so that should improve the overall ambience. Other than that, lovely restaurants, great amenities and a great location. Highly recommended.

title: more consideration for their customers during the check-in process
desc: I wish they could have shown more consideration for their customers during the check-in process. When I checked in at your hotel, I realized that I had left my passport at the St. Regis Singapore. Although I understood that I had to go back and retrieve it eventually, it was quite difficult for my children to go back and forth. So, I requested to check in using my Korean driver's license, which was written in English, and an expired copy of my passport. However, they refused, stating that they were unsure about my identity. I understand if it's the hotel's policy, but I still wonder if they could have been more flexible in this situation, especially considering we were family travelers. Nonetheless, I must say that I was impressed with the hotel's view and the food, and, in the

title: Rude middle management. Chaotic lobby. No Bonvoy
desc: This is the third time I have stayed at RC Singapore. I booked here through the Marriott bonvoy site as a lifetime platinum member and current titanium member. I struggle to understand why bonvoy still allows this hotel to sell rooms on their site when they not only offer no points or priveliges but high level staff clearly are not informed to give any respect to elite members. The hotel had a sports team in house which resulted in literally 1000 people screaming, pushing and running around the lobby and lifts in an attempt to meet them. The hotel made absolutely no attempt to ask these non guests to depart the hotel even after clearly making paying guests and the sports team uncomfortable. I cannot imagine this happening at any other RC worldwide. When I enquired with

title: 2 Nights for honeymoon
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights for my honeymoon before going to Bali. The service was unbelievable. The staff was extremely friendly. The gym was very nice. We had breakfast included in our stay and it was excellent. I'd highly recommend staying here.

title: Hotel refused to honour booking
desc: Very disappointed that RC has refused to honor my reservation booked under the Virtuoso rate on Hotelux. Had made a booking for a Marina bay view room with club access for my son’s birthday, and at the point of booking, it was unequivocally stated that my booking will come with club access, but when I made an enquiry about the upgrade that was part of the virtuoso rate, I received a shocking reply from Neah claiming that my booking is only for a room with breakfast and does not come with club access, while my initial query regarding the virtuoso rate benefits accorded was conveniently ignored. I was even curtly directed to liaise with hotelux myself, which I felt is irresponsible as even if there was an error in the booking, this error occurred through no fault of my own and I

title: What an amazing time
desc: My (now wife) and I came to ritz with just 1.5 months before our wedding on 8 July. As you can imagine it was incredibly rushed and there were many things to negotiate and finalise. This was not helped by the fact that we would be overseas for 2 weeks, from 1 month before the wedding. However Bethany and Le Ting helped to arrange a site viewing, food tasting and sound check even with the already-booked-out schedule. The responsiveness and decisiveness of Bethany really impressed us, as many decisions were able to be made thanks to the prompt info we received. The level of empathy we received from them was also commendable. From the wedding, we have much to thank for Naim (AV) and Forshana (service staff), who really went the extra mile for us. The level of excellence brought

title: Very nice rooms but some services do not work efficiently
desc: It had been a long time since I had not stayed at the Ritz Singapore (that was before COVID). The rooms are still very beautiful and offer a superb view on Marina Bay Sands. The other great features we liked about this hotel were: - superb breakfast buffet, international choice, with an efficient service - A fantastic fitness center, up to the standard of a proper commercial fitness - a nice and quiet swimming pool, with a good restaurant appropriate for snacks and drinks - a nice hotel bar - helpful staff at the concierge level and in the restaurants However, I was very disappointed by the service at the front desk.. Here are some of the experiences we had: - I remember in the past arriving at the front desk for check-in, giving my name, and 30 seconds later somebody

title: Stunning view and exceptional service
desc: The Marina room are not sparkling new, but their view is absolutely stunning and are quite well appointed and designed. What set the hotel apart for me however was the exemplary personalised service. Staff are genuinely helpful and are attentive to your particular personal preferences even when mentioned in passing. Particular shout out to Chris. We can’t wait to be back!

title: Excellent! Excellent! Excellent!
desc: The Ritz Carlton spa is the best treatment one can have. It has the la mer miracle broth treatment which makes me feel like a million dollars, each time. Beyond the treatments are the excellent staff. They are not only professional and skilful but also go beyond their call of duty to make you feel special. Ann, my favourite therapist ,with hee colleagues threw me a surprise birthday celebration before my treatment on my birthday month. They not only got me desserts, but also decorated the room with balloons, flowers and candles. I was so touched. This is really first class treatment with a lot of heart. Definitely recommended

title: Pleasant and enjoyable
desc: Beautiful night view of Marina Bay and waterfront. Room was clean and well maintained despite of it’s age. Thumbs up for Kola, house keeping staff who was helpful and detail ensuring our needs are met to have a pleasant stay. Unlike many hotels bathroom was tidy and maintained.

title: Club Lounge experience
desc: Beautiful hotel with amazing amenities. Cannot fault the Club lounge experience. Staff are the most customer focused group I have had the pleasure to meet. Jit Ilya Moira Jasper Mark Winston, all deserve mentions including those whose names I can’t remember.

title: Luxury and real comfort
desc: We just enjoyed a 10 night stay here with our adult daughter, staying in 2 club lounge rooms which was excellent It's less than 30 mins drive from Changi airport, and taxis are so cheap in Singapore compared with Australia. We arrived about 10pm and Jess booked us in and gave us a cuppa and savoury and sweet snacks which was much appreciated. The Ritz is only about 7 mins walk over the bridge walkway to various shopping malls. All the staff were friendly and very professional. The Club Lounge food was delicious and plentiful and a very worthwhile investment when staying here. We enjoyed the Colony restaurant for breakfast most mornings as a nice change. There are many various food stations here and seating moved quickly even at their busiest times. We enjoyed talking with the

title: The ultimate experience
desc: The rooms we're impecable and the bed was firm but surprisingly comfortable. The room service was great their attention to details and did i mention they clean the room twice a day! The food was excellent, better than the hawker centers experience and even better you get to enjoy them at the pool and not in an overly crowded place. My highlight of this trip was of course their pool and the pool services. Our pool boy Dave went out of his way everytime to ensure we had a great experience, this made our trip very memorable. For instance, he requested the head chef to make authentic dishes personally as we did not have an memorable experiences at multiple hawker centers. I highly recommend the ritz for a stay in singapore and highly recommend you to request Dave as your pool

title: Amazing trip to Singapore
desc: Great 1 week stay at the Ritz Carlton Singapore. I was met with amazing service and value. The food was amazing and all the employees were so welcoming and respectful. A special thanks to Dave at the pool for his impeccable service and his friendship. It really made my trip to Singapore unforgettable.

title: Club level experience outstanding.
desc: Combination of outstanding views, great location, and top notch service at Club level of Ritz Carlton made for a great stay in steamy Singapore. Moira and Sha were especially attentive, as well as Pitta and Dexter at front desk. Dinner at Summer pavilion was delicious. French fries and steak sandwich at Republic were great. The mattress was very comfortable

title: ritz-Carlton Spa for treatment experience
desc: I have a very good experience in the ritz-Carlton Spa!! Specially the staff- ANN did a great job!! She’s anlways smiling and helpful. Also Her massage technique is very good .BTW, Environment, comfort level, aromatherapy and the tea Is awesome. I will come back again .

title: Best experience at Colony
desc: We had our wedding celebratory champangne brunch at Ritz Carlton, Colony and it was the best experience we could ever ask for. Their attention to detail was flawless. John front Colony made it a personalised experience, remembering our names and dietary preferences throughout. The chefs were enthusiastic and helpful with their recommendations (Special mention to Chef Jian Ying at the Chinese portion of the buffet). They even customised our menu and looked out for our tables and served us personally. Amazing experience. Every trip to Colony just gets better

title: Wonderful stay by Drew and Peter Elphick
desc: Have just spent the last 10 days at the Ritz Carlton Hotel to reunite with our son. Stayed in a Club Lounge Room. We have been so impressed with the staff (Club Lounge) service and cannot speak highly enough of them. They were very attentive in every way and we will be highly recommending that our friends and family stay here if and when they arrive in Singapore. I would especially like to thank and address your wonderful staff employees who were so helpful and supportive as follows Jithra Chuck Moira Illlya Jasper Aisha’s Jessica Bernise Chef Banson Once again thank you all and very sorry for those I have missed. Hope to visit again

title: It is the best hotel to stay in Singapore for sure!
desc: The guy from the pool named Nikko was really kind, easy to communicate in English, he recommended us some places to visit in singapore. Also he made us the singapore sling and it was so good. I definitely want to come back and stay in this hotel in the future to explore.

title: Wonderful Hotel!
desc: All the hotel staff were very helpful, professionally trained and efficient. Staying at the Executive Floors with access to the Lounge is most practical, for Singapore. You can have almost all your meals there. Exceptional Food. The Chefs were really amazing- great quality salads, main dishes, etc. The room is very well maintained. Outstanding views of Singapore, with those huge picture windows. This is really the place to stay in Singapore.

title: 10th Anniversary Bliss!
desc: Where do I start? We chose the Ritz Carlton Singapore for our 10th anniversary and we did not regret it. The Breakfast every morning at Colony was spectacular, with plenty of variety and friendly service. The location is great as we were able to walk to many of the attractions in Singapore from our hotel. We had great service from the housekeeping staff. I ran out of toothpaste about half way through the trip and left the empty tube on the counter. Without asking I was given a full size tube of toothpaste. Swamy, He Qing, and Sai Krishna did an amazing job of making our room clean and comfortable every day. We also spent time relaxing around the pool where Dave and Jamie provided us with great drinks and service. Jamie also gave us great advice on which Hawker centers

title: Favourite hotel
desc: Favourite hotel On our many trips through Singapore in the past 20 years we have stayed at many hotels in the city but have decided that The RC is definitely now our hotel of choice. The beautifully appointed rooms with the fabulous river views, the warm welcome on checkin -appreciated after a 12 hour flight-the flexibility of arrangements re late checkin and departure and above all the friendliness of the staff no matter where they worked -always willing to assist and on this occasion we particularly appreciated the help, advice and service of the pool attendant Nikko who was particularly pleasant and attentive. We will not stay anywhere else.

title: 3 Star Hotel Cosplaying as a Ritz Carlton
desc: This is a substandard Ritz Carlton that is closer to a decent 3 star hotel than a top 5 star hotel. The Room: I was in a basic king room with a view of the bay for four nights. The view itself was very nice, but besides that the room was disappointing. The room is quite dated and lacks finishes commensurate to a modern five star property. The shower was defective or just of very low quality and was perpetually stuck spewing very hot water for about 10 minutes until the temperature would change. Housekeeping was good - no complaints there. The Service: Generally, the service was below average (besides the front desk staff). To add some color here and give a few examples: - I went to the Chinese restaurant to have dinner and asked to see a menu while indicating that I was

title: It's Like Coming Back Home!
desc: My wife & I have just returned from a 13 night stay at the Ritz Carlton Millenia, our second stay this year. I've said it before & I'll say it again, this is our home away from home. This hotel simply has so many pluses that we wouldn't consider staying anywhere else. The views from the Marina May side are without compare and if you're in a Club room, even better. Colony remains the restaurant where we've eaten some of the best and most enjoyable meals of our lives. The hotel is situated right next to Marina Square Mall, moments from Millenia Walk and Suntec City and moments again from Marina Bay Sands, the Merlion & so much more. It couldn't be more perfectly located. But what brings us back time after time are the wonderful staff. Our thanks go to the ever helpful staff in the

title: Beautiful hotel In great location
desc: The hotel is in great location for the bay and local shopping malls . Promenade MRT a few minutes walk away. Hotel is beautifully crafted , the website does it no justice . Artworks galore ! Staff are very welcoming and it is safe and clean . Food is amazing though limited halal options. Amazing spa and great outdoor swimming pool.

title: Highly recommend
desc: Ambience exceeded our expectations, the area was very well maintained and well looked after by the staff. The Head of Guest Relations, Prakash and Hamzah from the Club Lounge team really looked after us and assisted us with all our requests. I would definitely recommend this hotel. Apart from the lovely staff, the hotel is situated strategically. There is also a mall nearby which is about 5 minutes walk from the lobby.

title: New familia. Great service
desc: Nikko and Katrina @ the Ritz Carlton pool have been so amazing that I call them friends actually famiglia I was so well looked looked after that I think no I know that they will be great at whatever position they have will exel. Good luck to you both you have made my stay very memorable thank you again.❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Top quality as usual but need to evolve
desc: Ritz brand itself says it all but naturally you expect top quality from them. Many luxury hotels these days have upped their game and evolve over time and I think Ritz could consider making some changes. We booked to stay at the club level room. The breakfast was included but only in the club lounge. There weren’t plenty of choices with menu similar everyday. So we wanted to check out downstairs in the Colony restaurant. But they required additional $25 per person. I understand that Colony has been such a flagship selling point for them that extended to external hotel guests but the business modelling may need some rethinking for your club level guest. All luxury hotels in Asia does amazing breakfast these days with plenty of options from noodles, rice, congee, local

title: SUNDAY Brunch... Great service
desc: Sunday Brunch... always a good Sunday brunch..never disappointed... today my compliments to staff.. Tin , jack n Carol for their extra service on a splendid service. Always a nice Sunday with ppl like these 😍 ❤️❤️❤️🩷🩷❤️ great food n gd service ...highly recommended

title: GOOD EXPERIENCE AND EXCEPTIONAL STAY
desc: It was a great experience to stay in this luxurious hotel. The check in was slightly slower probably due to quite a high number of guests checking in at that hour about 4pm. The room & the view were great. Except we could hear footsteps & noises at night from the above floor due to the parquet flooring of the room. Sometimes can be quite annoying when anyone was walking. Other than this annoying sound, the hotel is great. They provided 2 smaller square pillows & I like it as I could hug to sleep. The hotel provides a nice spa area with steam room, sauna room, jacuzzi pools with full amenities.

title: A Exceptional Birthday by Ritz Carlton Singapore
desc: First and foremost, I would like add what truly sets Ritz Carlton apart is their exceptional service - A big shoutout to the team Av manager Najib, Jit Assistant mgr of Club Lounge,Team VIP services, Chef Sagong for the wonderful and lovely Birthday surprise. Everything was just PERFECT . From my entrance to the pink room and the delicious birthday cake. It was AN EXCEPTIONAL birthday experience. The service was impeccable. My room was not only beautifully designed but also exceptionally clean and well-maintained. The attention to detail was evident, and it truly felt like a home away from home. The comfortable bed ensured a restful night's sleep, and the panoramic views from my window were breathtaking.

title: Good but not Great
desc: While the hotel is gorgeous and the service had been amazing thus far, i would had rated my experience to be at a 5 instead of 2 should the check in process be much smoother. I’ve checked in at the club lounge and in the midst of the process I’ve noted that the staff checking me in, Hamzah, was training a lady staff. I see nothing wrong with training new staff however after being asked a few questions about my reservation and payment, Hamzah, the trainer himself, was not able to answer any of it. Which is very surprising as the trainer should atleast have the enough experience before they start training others. While I manage to checked in early on that day, i was left with more questions and confusion on my reservation. I was expecting a follow up from him after he informed

title: Great Experience
desc: The DEEP MUSCLE RECOVERY sooo good, so much pain dissolved during the 90 min. It is not just relaxing but very rejuvenating as well. Zara she is really good. The skills of hitting the spots that are sore and releasing the tension from my spine. Great Job!

title: Absolutely perfect wedding anniversary
desc: We had celebrated our 20th wedding anniversary with coming to Singapore to stay here and so decided to come back for our 30th. The hotel of course is gorgeous, elegant and stylish and the views are unbeatable. What made this even better than expected was the level of service we received from everyone to help us mark our special stay. Many thanks to everyone, including our housekeeping team, but a very special thanks to Kaylee at check in, who went out of her way to make sure we had a very special stay, upgrading our room and providing all sorts of lovely extras. We knew we would have a great stay here but did not expect this level of service. As good as it gets!

title: Wonderful experience!
desc: The staff takes care of every little detail so your stay is perfect! The restaurant is a buffet. We tried breakfast and lunch and went back for one of the two at least once a day! They have food from all over the world! All is very high quality! I wanted to try everything!!! Our room had the view of the Marina and it was perfect!

title: Favourite
desc: Best hotel in Singapore. Can come back again and again only for this hotel. Everyone should learn hospitality from them. They know there stuff pretty well. We loved every bit of our stay. No Complains Cheers!

title: Amazing Stay
desc: Beautiful property with amazing staff especially Diana from Guest Relations. The rooms are so amazing that it makes staying at any other hotels miserable. Lunch buffet at Colony was also very delicious and extensive. Regret not staying in a Club room!

title: The Best Five Star in Singapore
desc: I must have stayed in all the 5-stars hotels in Singapore with these years of business travelling. RC Singapore has always been my number one choice. I loved bringing my family here. As a result of my once a month stay, every one in the hotel called out my name and welcomed me back whenever I entered the lobby. The luxurious room with their high RC bed was something I always looked forward to. And those fluffy white slippers were so inviting. A card by the GM slipped under the free bottles of water was a nice touch. Not to mention the bath tub that came with great sea view while the Merlion stood in the distance. And the Bulgari products provided in the bathroom was simply heavenly. The huge outdoor pool surrounded by thick tropical plantation was a sheer delight. The

title: Spacious Bathroom Layout
desc: Bathtub overlook a view of the Marina area. The bathroom-toilet is more spacious than rooms at other hotels, and its practical layout is perfect for when there is a need to host guests joining for tea in the room. Big window adds to the luxury of the room.

title: Absolutely fabulous hotel.
desc: We had booked a room with a view of the bay. When we arrived our room was not ready. We did not mind waiting however after 10 minutes the staff told us that they had upgraded us to a suite. This suite was magnificent . Staff so lovely and helpful, food really good. The hotel staff made our holiday very special

title: Another wonderful stay
desc: Now flagged as the hotel with best FNB establishments, RCMS is definitely the hotel to stay! Hotel rooms are well-maintained and the Bayview rooms are still highly sought-after. However, restaurants like Summer Pavilion and Colony made the entire stay experience truly wholesome and memorable!

title: Such a nice memory !!
desc: I hope that it is not too late to write this review... :) We stayed at Ritz Carlton Singapore last year. I just looked at photos and videos again when we have visited Singapore last time and just realized that I did not write about you yet ! We really enjoyed our stay there. We booked a Deluxe Marina View room. Our room is on a high floor and the view was so breathtaking !!! The room had a lot of space. The bathroom was so beautiful ! The buffet breakfast was the best with many choices and stations (european, asian...etc). The staff was professional and polite. Thanks again for giving us such a nice memory in Singapore !

title: Good F&B outlets and nice public areas, rooms outdated.
desc: We stopped at the Ritz Millenia Singapore for one night from pur way back from Malaysia. The Hotel is located next to two shopping centers and in walking distance to the Singapore flyer, gardens by the bay and the Marina Bay Sands. The public areas of the hotels are clean, beautiful and full of art. While the woman who escorted us from the car drop off to the front desk was very nice and helpful with first questions, the check in itself felt a bit rushed and not very welcoming. The room itself was nice and spacious but the furnishings were a little bit outdated, On the positive side there was a Nespresso coffee maker in the room, but unfortunately the tea was pretty poor quality. As I moved the wall mount of the TV to see better from the bed, i suddenly stood in a large

title: The Number One Luxury Hotel In Singapore!
desc: I consider the Ritz-Carlton in Singapore to be one of the finest hotels in Asia today. I have stayed here on several occasions and have also hosted international leaders here. I encourage you to secure a suite with a view of the city. It has a gorgeous view! While I was there the last time, I order room service, while taking in the view of the city from my room. When I arrived at the Singapore International Airport, I had arranged a hotel driver to pick me up. He was there on time and made my exit from the airport fast.

title: Luxurious Hotel and Amazing Service!
desc: Excellent place, view and service! Definitely a 6-star hotel experience. It was my surprised bday present 🎁 to my fiancé and we’re both very happy that first we had a very smooth check-in. Second, we got the best view and/or room location facing the Marina Bay Sands . Third, they delivered us cake for my fiancé for his bday. Buffet breakfast winner! Variety of dishes to choose from appetisers, local dishes, salad, desserts and so on. Overall, very happy and satisfied guests. Will definitely recommend for those who don’t mind to spend a bit pricey hotel but great service at the same time. Excellent!

title: Excellent
desc: Excellent service and room. Best value for money and the view is excellent . Highly recommended for family couple solo . One of the best hotel in Singapore . Hope to be back again . The room was nice .

title: It's a wow place
desc: This offer was really magnificent everything is excellent including the food lottery understand the location whether you're coming in a business trip or in a vacation will enjoy it. Room cleanliness is magnificent and the staff are really helpful

title: Still the one ...
desc: I first stayed in this hotel 20 years ago, when it was cutting edge. Of course a lot has evolved since then, and I was a little apprehensive as to how the rooms would fare against modern standards. No need to worry about service - this remains top class. The good news is the RC has evolved with the times, and it is a great experience in room as well as in the catered areas of the hotel. I was attending a conference at the Mandarin, which is easily walked to from the RC, and the RC lacked nothing in ambience. Singapore has so many great hotels, and maybe my history here makes me biased, but in my opinion, the RC is still the one when it comes to top class hotels in SG.

title: Summer Pavilion Restaurant
desc: The wagyu beef was simple, some what flavorful. I was thankful that my requested choice with the Manager in charge turned out well because my food allergies to certain Asian cuisines. The manager was helpful and pleasant with my special order. The combination of asparagus and mushrooms to enhance the lightly sautéed beef was done fairly well to my gastronomic delights. Yummy tummy for their dessert!!! The service was great and the ambience was wonderful. Many sincere thanks !!

title: Superb restaurant!
desc: Very nice restaurant with delicious food and wine. Been there for a business dinner and was very amazed about food, drinks and service. Also the atmosphere and the servicr is very nice and outstanding. This review is only for the restaurant, but not the hotel, as we stayed at s different place, but came just for dinner.

title: Fancy hotel & delicious breakfast buffet
desc: + Room is spacious and clean + Big bathroom, separate shower & bath, bathtub with a city view + Variety of breakfast buffet, I like the smoked salmon & egg benedict - Location is not convenient. A bit far from city centre

title: Classy and unbeatable service .
desc: This was our 2nd visit to The Ritz Carlton. After our first visit in 2016 we had promised ourselves that we would bring our daughter son in law and granddaughter to this amazing hotel with the best views and service! We booked two marina bay view executive suites which were simply WOW . Besides excellent views of the Marina Bay ..lovely light shows every evening and simply unbeatable service and quality of food in the club lounge . It was just before Christmas we went and it was our daughters wedding anniversary as well which they helped celebrate in great style with cakes and chocolates in their suite as well as serving a lovely meal for them. Everyone was very professional and provided excellent service. The bedding is superb the bathrooms are excellent....really there is

title: The Right Location
desc: I always love a stay in the Marina Bay area. This was my 3rd visit to Singapore and my husband and I were excited to try this hotel. We typically stay at the Mandarin, but they were fully committed. We were granted access to our rooms for an early check in - this is always a nice surprise and they had upgraded our suites to better suites as a happy 25 year anniversary surprise! The suites are lovely, spacious and comfortable. This hotel has the most delicious cocktails and mocktails + I personally feel their take on the Singapore Sling is the best I've ever had. They created a beautiful flowered bed and sweets arrangement for our anniversary celebration and even did a small cake at turndown. These were some of the nicest things :-). Some of the things we were not

title: Great Hotel
desc: Big spacious room. Superb view of MBS. Big bathroom. Clean and big king bed. Everything was really good celebrated my Anniversary that time. Buffet dinner was great too. Big range of food and delicious meal.

title: Very good hotel and really top service and hospitality at the club lounge level
desc: I have been to Singapore a number of times and being at the Ritz in Singapore is like coming home. I used to stay in the Club lounge level. The team members and their efforts making the difference to other luxury hotels. The head of the Club lounge is Sheila - Great hospitaliy and always welcoming and supporting my wishes. I have had a marina bay view which is wonderful. Just sitting in the room and appreciate the view ... Rooms are spacious and bath tub with window to overlook the marina. Big rooms in comparison to other hotels in Singapore. Walking distance to the Sands hotel (infinity pool and great bar, casino etc.) You can use the club lounge for meetings as well and is a perfect location to meet business partners and colleagues.

title: Beautiful property and views
desc: We stayed three nights at this property and found it to be accommodating and comfortable. We arrived very late from our overseas flight (12:30 am) and were greeted by staff as if they had just began their day. They were friendly, helpful, and did all they could do to quickly get us registered so we could get some needed sleep. The property by night was beautiful. By day, it was just as pretty. The grounds are well kept and staff from front desk, to concierge to doorman/woman (and there were ALOT of them) were on their game. Always smiling, always helpful, never put out with a question or request. The room was gorgeous. We overlooked the Bay through the enormous wall of window with about 1/2 of the Singapore Flyer in our view. The room was quite large with a King sized

title: Wonderful Surprise
desc: Full disclosure... we always have stayed at Raffles while in Singapore, but due to its closure for renovation (much needed I must add), we decided to try the Ritz-Carlton Millenia. We opted for a glorious deluxe one bedroom concierge level suite and were absolutely thrilled with the gorgeous accommodation, stunning Marina views and superb concierge level support, not to mention the wonderful breakfast, lunch and cocktail hour food and beverages in the lounge. A complimentary car service is also available to take you to nearby sights, etc. (on first come/first serve basis). The hotel is very well located, and convenient to almost anything you want...nice that it is attached to the Millenia Mall too. All the amenities, including Asprey toiletries, lovely turn down service,

title: Beautiful hotel and great service!
desc: The rooms were fantastic (especially the bathrooms) with fantastic views of the city! The staff was excellent and a special thanks to Aylmer Tan for making a special effort to make us feel welcome and like VIPs. The hotel is well situated close to the Marina area that is very walk-able! We swam in the beautiful pool each evening and totally enjoyed our stay!

title: Excellent service from start to finish!
desc: We were greeted well by Karen at the reception. She and her colleague Roystance took really good care of us and helped us with a few requests. We were first staying at the Marina Bay Sands, but changed hotel because of the overcrowding and inpersonal touch! I can strongly recommend The Ritz Millenia Singapore and will definitely be back!

title: Location & Service!
desc: It was my first time to Singapore and I was in between Marina Bay Sands or the Ritz Carlton, and my choice did not disappoint. First off the view from my room was priceless, rooms were big and spacious and their iconic soaking bathtub with the marina view was magical. The location was just right with connecting malls and metro and its fairly easy to travel to places like Fullerton hotel or the Merlion Park. What's more, we are a few minutes away from Singapore's metro system which brings us straight to the City and Orchard Road! The club at Ritz Carlton was nothing short but luxurious. The food varieties and spread in the buffet were more than what I eat on a daily basis!! Everyone in the lounge was friendly and so attentive to every guest! I was taken aback when they greeted

title: Excellent service at Chihuly Lounge
desc: I had hi tea buffet with my girlfriends and thumbs up for the service crews! They are fully attentive, highly professional, warm and welcoming! I would like to specially compliment the service staff, Dunstan. He is knowledgeable, gave us an introduction of the various tea flavors, and constantly checking if we needed extra top up of our drinks and if we needed any further assistance! We felt so comfortable and welcoming that we continue to stay on after hi tea and ordered wine. Highly recommend to visit Chihuly Lounge! The staff are well mannered, well trained and it was a superb dining experience for my galfriends and myself!!

title: Extraordinary Service
desc: Just wanted to acknowledge the extraordinary accommodation that was extended to us by Sandrine Qu, who has gone above and beyond in order to satisfy our cravings for dim sum. We must also mention Chun Wei and Angel of Summer Pavilion, who prepared us the most sumptuous dim sum we’ve ever tasted. These individuals have surely made a difference for their exceptional service.

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights on business. Having been to Singapore more times than I can remember and stayed at a number of top class hotels, the Ritz Carlton is now my new favourite. The levels of service are outstanding across the whole team (from check-in onwards). Although they don’t participate in the Marriott Rewards (my only gripe) they still offered me a late check out and upgraded my room. The room was on a corner and had amazing views over both the marina and the city. Now, to the real good stuff. The breakfast buffet was the best I have seen and that is saying something being as I have stayed at some of the best hotels across the whole of Asia. From the choice of Chinese, Indian, Japanese, local, Western, pastries, desserts, dumplings, ice-cream etc. etc. etc.,

title: Personalised Excellence
desc: The Club Level offers luxury and personal choice. The staff led by Sheila and Chuck ensured all your needs were met. In saying this it should be noted that all staff from the check-in, dining experience and the housekeeping were friendly and highly skilled in their roles. The pool area offered an oasis from the hectic pace of Singapore. Confirmation of this amazing experience was in meeting numerous travellers, families and couples, who come back every year to the Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore.

title: Beyond Expectations - Staff and Buffet Heads Above the Rest
desc: When you book a room at a Ritz-Carlton anywhere in the world, you know you’re booking a nice room at a flagship hotel. But the staff at the Ritz-Carlton Millenia were hands down the most kind-hearted, attentive, and hospitable professionals I’ve ever encountered in my travels (sorry Komeneka ;). Whether it was Lee Lee and Kharti providing custom items at the AMAZING breakfast buffet (literally the best buffet in the world) or Ricardo on the housekeeping team ensuring we had extra waters for our pool time, each person we encountered seemed eager and excited to assist. If you’re traveling to Singapore and haven’t made up your mind on where to stay, the Ritz on Raffles will surely make your vacation. (Side note: the Chihuly Lounge is wonderful, but don’t order an “Irish Coffee”

title: EXEMPLARY !!
desc: Once again i returned to the fabulous Ritz Carlton Hotel in Singapore. This time to celebrate my mothers 80th birthday. The wonderful ,friendly ,kind staff , lead by Sheila and Chuck went beyond my expectations to ensure my mother had the most memorable stay. From organising our room close to the lifts, providing a beautiful birthday cake and banner to everyday making us feel so welcome and special. The rooms are so spacious and clean and the food in the entire hotel is exemplary!!! I will not be staying anywhere else when I return to Singapore.

title: Superb
desc: We spent two nights here in a club room and everything was fantastic. The club lounge is superb....probably the best club lounge we have ever been in. Special thanks to Sheila in the lounge. Well done to the management team. You are running a fantastic hotel. If you are going to Singapore then you should pick this hotel. I guarantee you won’t be disappointed.

title: Still impress
desc: I stayed at Ritz Carlton Singapore again . Everything is still great. Ami, the staff at the front. Sharon at the Chihuly lounge. And the guy at Colony (sorry that i cannot remember his name) are great at their seevice. Although the hotel is crowded during Chinese New Year Day. The service from your staffs really make me happy. Nothing to say much except Ritz Carlton Singapore is one of the greatest hotel for me. Love and sure to be back again and again.

title: Still Wonderful
desc: Amazing suite with Marina Bay View which is incredible when lit up at night. Club worth upgrade with great staff. Thank you Sheila, Chuckie, Sherlyn for making our trip so enjoyable & JC who pointed out many places of interest for us to visit.

title: Fantastic Service, Amazing Hotel
desc: Ritz-Carlton Singapore doesn't appeal much to the eyes from the exterior but once inside, it's a whole different story. They have amazing views from the room and the club lounge. The club level is definitely a must ! We were treated like royalty through the entire stay. We were then greeted by Dickson at the hotel lobby and was escorted straight to the club floor for checkin. Firdaus checked us in and assisted us all weekend. He had even arranged a special champagne and cake in our room after getting to know that we were on our honeymoon trip across Asia. Such a lovely surprise !! He made amazing recommendations, local dinner reservations with the best chilli crab we've ever had, and even booked me a hair appointment when I needed a blow out. We looked forward to talking with

title: Great location, Excellent Staff Service! Wonderful entertainment
desc: Stayed here for 5 days accompanying my wife on a business trip. The professionalism and personal attentiveness of each member of the staff was exceptional! In particular, Ryan Ng went out of his way to assist me on my initial request and then looked out for me every time I encountered him and was always very solicitous of our needs each time we talked. The location overlooking Marina Bay is spectacular. Nice fitness center and great pool. Bonus was the entertainment in the Chihuly Lounge. Daniel Park is currently performing there for the next few months. He is a very talented musician and singer, does some interesting things looping his guitar and violin. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay here when we return in a few months.

title: Amazing and unforgettable vacation
desc: My husband and I arrived at the Ritz Carlton Singapore Hotel after traveling 18 hours from New York . We were kindly greeted by Michelle with Champagne at the 32 floor were the club lounge was located . The check in process was smooth and we were very pleased to find out out that our room was steps away from the Club Lounge . The bedrooms are very well equipped, with amazing views that displays the beauty of Singapore . The bathroom are fantastic, beds comfortable and the room service was excellent. The hotel location is great ! It is right next to large shopping malls . We made good use of the gym and the swimming pool and the facilities were very good . The club Lounge staff let by Sheila Tan Benzon were excellent and they went above and beyond to meet our needs . We had

title: What a beautiful property!
desc: I had the pleasure in staying at this “Beautiful” property for 3 days whilst I conducted a site visit. This property by far is the Best of the Best. They still carry the old traditional real Ritz Carlton values and customer service. I’m talking when the Ritz was the Ritz before being purchased by Marriott. Every staff member that encountered provided me stellar service with a smile. I truly enjoyed the decor of the property and the fine outlets that they have. The serounding area activities only added to what became a picture perfect property. If ever you are contemplating a vacation in Singapore and you’re researching a hotel to stay, STOP! Why research. I just have you your answer!! I will be back in March and unfortunately they have assigned me to stay at Marina Sands

title: Superb!
desc: The night buffet is fantastic. Lobster and oysters are the best. Wide choice of different cuisine, the ambience is sophisticated and elegant. The Chinese corner is outstanding in order of quality of food and choice

title: Beautiful Your
